                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m8.7">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m8.5"/>

                        <XMWrap>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus we can write <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in
block-matrix form with respect to the decomposition</p>

        <p>If we define, for <Math mode="inline" tex="k,l\in J" text="list@(k, l) element-of J" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m10.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m10.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m10.1">k</XMTok>

                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m10.2">l</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\widetilde{{A}}}_{k,\,l}={\widetilde{{P}}}_{k}\,A|_{{\widetilde{{H}}}_{l}}" text="(widetilde@(A)) _ (list@(k, l)) = evaluated-at@((widetilde@(P)) _ k * A, (widetilde@(H)) _ l)" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m11.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m11.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m11.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m11.2">l</XMTok>

                    <XMWrap>

                          <XMApp>

                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                        </XMApp>

                      </XMApp>

                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m11.3">

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we can also write <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in
block-matrix form with respect to the decomposition</p>

        <p>and of course <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widetilde{{A}}}_{k,\,l}=\bigl{(}A_{{u,\,v}}\bigr{)}_{u\,\in\,I_{k},\,v\,\in%&#10;\,I_{l}}" text="(widetilde@(A)) _ (list@(k, l)) = A _ (list@(u, v)) _ (formulae@(u element-of I _ k, v element-of I _ l))" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m13.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m13.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m13.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m13.2">l</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m13.7"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m13.7">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m13.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m13.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m13.3">u</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m13.4">v</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m13.5"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m13.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m13.5">
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">u</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m13.6">
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">v</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="k,\,l\in J" text="list@(k, l) element-of J" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m14.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS1.p4.m14.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m14.1">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS1.p4.m14.2">l</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" xml:id="S4.SS2">
      <tags>
        <tag>4.2</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection 4.2</tag>

        <tag role="typerefnum">§4.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">4.2</tag>A formula for the projection <Math mode="inline" tex="{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}" text="[P] _ pi" xml:id="S4.SS2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
              <XMText><text font="sansserif bold">P</text></XMText>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="HS(H)" text="H * S * H" xml:id="S4.SS2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.m2.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.m2.1">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> on
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\textbf{{E}}}_{\pi}" text="[E] _ pi" xml:id="S4.SS2.m3">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
              <XMText><text font="sansserif bold">E</text></XMText>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math>.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p1">
        <p>Our first aim in this section is to give an explicit formula for the
projection <Math mode="inline" tex="{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A" text="[P] _ pi * A" xml:id="S4.SS2.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMText><text font="sansserif bold">P</text></XMText>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of a Hilbert-Schmidt operator <Math mode="inline" tex="A\in HS(H)" text="A element-of H * S * H" xml:id="S4.SS2.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p1.m2.1">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on the closed
subspace of <Math mode="inline" tex="HS(H)" text="H * S * H" xml:id="S4.SS2.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p1.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p1.m3.1">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex18">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\textbf{{E}}}_{\pi}=\{T\in HS(H)\,;\,\pi(g)\,T=T\,\pi(g)\ \textrm{for&#10;every}\ g\in G\}" xml:id="S4.Ex18.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMText><text font="sansserif bold">E</text></XMText>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex18.m1.1">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex18.m1.2">g</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex18.m1.3">g</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="5.0pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMText rpadding="5.0pt">for
every</XMText>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and to compute the norm of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A" text="[P] _ pi * A" xml:id="S4.SS2.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMText><text font="sansserif bold">P</text></XMText>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMApp>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>

      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_proposition" inlist="thm theorem:proposition" labels="LABEL:Proposition_5.1" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1">
        <tags>
          <tag>Proposition 4.1</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">4.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 4.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 4.1</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a compact representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, written in the form <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{j\,\in J}\bigl{(}{\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{i\,%&#10;\in I_{j}}\pi{{}_{i,\,j}}\bigr{)}" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="pre4"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m4.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m4.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m4.1">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m4.2">j</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMath>
              </Math> as discussed in Section <ref labelref="LABEL:Section_4.1"/> above. For every
Hilbert-Schmidt operator <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem1.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>,
we have</text></p>
          <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A1.EGx1">
            <equation xml:id="S4.Ex19">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\dfrac{1}{d_{j}}\sum_{u,\,%&#10;v\,\in\,I_{j}}\,\emph{tr}\bigl{(}U_{v,\,j}^{*}\,U_{u,\,j}\,A_{u,\,v}\bigr{)}\,%&#10;\tau_{u,\,j}\,U_{u,\,j}^{*}\,U_{v,\,j}\,P_{v,\,j}." text="[P] _ pi * A = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@([tr] * (U _ (list@(v, j))) ^ * * U _ (list@(u, j)) * A _ (list@(u, v)) * tau _ (list@(u, j)) * (U _ (list@(u, j))) ^ * * U _ (list@(v, j)) * P _ (list@(v, j))))" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.17"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.17">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                              <XMText><text font="sansserif bold italic">P</text></XMText>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid9"/>
                                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.1"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.2"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.1">u</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.2">v</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMText class="ltx_emph">tr</XMText>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.17.1"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.17.1">
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                          <XMApp>
                                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                                            <XMDual>
                                              <XMApp>
                                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.3"/>
                                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.4"/>
                                              </XMApp>
                                              <XMWrap>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.3">v</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.4">j</XMTok>
                                              </XMWrap>
                                            </XMDual>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                                          <XMDual>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.5"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.6"/>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.5">u</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.6">j</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                          <XMDual>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.7"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex19.m3.8"/>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.7">u</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m3.8">v</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>

                  <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A" text="[P] _ pi * A" xml:id="S4.Ex19.m1">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMApp>

            <equation xml:id="S4.Ex21">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle||{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A||^{2}=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\dfrac{1}{d_{j}}%&#10;\sum_{u,\,v\,\in I_{j}}\bigl{|}\emph{tr}\bigl{(}U_{v,\,j}^{*}\,U_{u,\,j}\,A_{u%&#10;,\,v}\bigr{)}\bigr{|}^{2}." text="(norm@([P] _ pi * A)) ^ 2 = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@((absolute-value@([tr] * (U _ (list@(v, j))) ^ * * U _ (list@(u, j)) * A _ (list@(u, v)))) ^ 2))" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>

                                                  </XMApp>
                                                  <XMWrap>
                                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m3.7">u</XMTok>
                                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m3.8">v</XMTok>
                                                  </XMWrap>
                                                </XMDual>
                                              </XMApp>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>
                                        </XMDual>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
                <MathBranch>
                  <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle||{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A||^{2}" text="(norm@([P] _ pi * A)) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m1">
                      <XMath>

                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMath>
                    </Math></td>
                  <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\dfrac{1}{d_{j}}\sum_{u,\,v\,\in I_{j}}\bigl{|}%&#10;\emph{tr}\bigl{(}U_{v,\,j}^{*}\,U_{u,\,j}\,A_{u,\,v}\bigr{)}\bigr{|}^{2}." text="absent = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@((absolute-value@([tr] * (U _ (list@(v, j))) ^ * * U _ (list@(u, j)) * A _ (list@(u, v)))) ^ 2))" xml:id="S4.Ex21.m2">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex21.m2.9"/>

      </theorem>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" labels="LABEL:Remark_5.2" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2">
        <tags>
          <tag>Remark 4.2</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">4.2</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.2</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 4.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 4.2</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">In the particular case where <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> has
the form <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi=\pi^{\prime}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{j\,\in J}\bigl{(}{\mathop{\oplus}}%&#10;\limits_{i\,\in I_{j}}\pi_{j}\bigr{)}" text="pi = pi ^ prime = (direct-sum _ (j element-of J))@((direct-sum _ (i element-of I _ j))@(pi _ j))" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m2.1">
                            <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                              <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, i. e. when for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{j\,\in J}" text="j element-of J" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> the representations <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi{{}_{i,\,j}}" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMApp role="FLOATSUBSCRIPT" scriptpos="4">
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m4.1">i</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m4.2">j</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="{i\,\in I_{j}}" text="i element-of I _ j" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, are equal (and not only equivalent), the formula becomes</text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex22">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\dfrac{1}{d_{j}}\sum_{u,\,v\,\in I_{j}}%&#10;\textrm{tr}(A_{{u,\,v}})\,\tau_{u,\,j}\,i_{{u,\,v}}\,P_{v,\,j}" text="[P] _ pi * A = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@([tr] * A _ (list@(u, v)) * tau _ (list@(u, j)) * i _ (list@(u, v)) * P _ (list@(v, j))))" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMText><text font="sansserif bold italic">P</text></XMText>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.1">u</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.2">v</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMText><text font="italic">tr</text></XMText>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.11"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.11">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.3"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.4"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.3">u</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.4">v</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.5"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.6"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.5">u</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.6">j</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.7"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.8"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.7">u</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.8">v</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.9"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex22.m1.10"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.9">v</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex22.m1.10">j</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p><text font="italic">where <Math mode="inline" tex="i_{{u,\,v}}" text="i _ (list@(u, v))" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m6.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m6.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m6.1">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m6.2">v</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is the identity operator from <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{v,\,j}" text="H _ (list@(v, j))" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m7.1"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m7.1">v</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> into
<Math mode="inline" tex="H_{u,\,j}" text="H _ (list@(u, j))" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem2.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                </XMath>
              </Math>. For any <Math mode="inline" tex="B\in{HS}(H)" text="B element-of H * S * H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem3.p1.m16">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                      <XMDual>

                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, we have</text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex23">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{{\langle{A^{\prime}},{B}\rangle}}=\textrm{tr}\bigl{(}B_{{u,\,v}}^{*}\,A_{{u,%&#10;\,v}}\bigr{)}={{\langle{A_{{u,\,v}}},{B_{{u,\,v}}}\rangle}}," text="list@(A ^ prime, B) = [tr] * (B _ (list@(u, v))) ^ * * A _ (list@(u, v)) = list@(A _ (list@(u, v)), B _ (list@(u, v)))" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.10"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.10">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.10.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.9"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.10.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.9">B</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMText><text font="italic">tr</text></XMText>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.10.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.10.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.1"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.2"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.1">u</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.2">v</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.3"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.4"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.3">u</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.4">v</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.10.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.10.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.10.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.5"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.6"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.5">u</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.6">v</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.10.4">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.7"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex23.m1.8"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.7">u</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex23.m1.8">v</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p><text font="italic">the last notation being slightly abusive.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p2">
        <p>The proof of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_5.1"/> relies on the following
lemma, which gives a complete description of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\textbf{{E}}}_{\pi}" text="[E] _ pi" xml:id="S4.SS2.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMText><text font="sansserif bold">E</text></XMText>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in terms of
block-matrices.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:Lemma_5.3" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem4">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma 4.4</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">4.4</tag>

          <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 4.4</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 4.4</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem4.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">The space <Math mode="inline" tex="{\textbf{{E}}}_{\pi}" text="[E] _ pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem4.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMText><text font="sansserif bold">E</text></XMText>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> consists of the operators <Math mode="inline" tex="T\in\emph{HS}(H)" text="T element-of [HS] * H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem4.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMText class="ltx_emph"><text font="upright">HS</text></XMText>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem4.p1.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> such
that</text></p>

                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.I2.ix10.p1.m5.9">u</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="S4.I2.ix10.p1.m5.10">v</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic">.</text></p>
              </para>
            </item>
          </enumerate>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p3">
        <p>[Proof of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:Lemma_5.3"/>]
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="T\in{HS}(H)" text="T element-of H * S * H" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>

                    <XMWrap>

                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The equalities <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi(g)\,T=T\,\pi(g)" text="pi * g * T = T * pi * g" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m2">
