Thus the operator
<Math mode="inline" tex="\smash{{{S_{{u,\,v}}=U_{u,\,k}\,T_{{u,\,v}}\,U_{v,\,l}^{*}}:\xymatrix{{K_{l}}%&#10;\ar[r]&amp;{K_{k}}}}}" text="S _ (list@(u, v)) = U _ (list@(u, k)) * T _ (list@(u, v)) * (U _ (list@(v, l))) ^ * colon [\xymatrix] * K _ l * [\ar] * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; * K _ k" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m11.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m11.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11.1">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11.2">v</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m11.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m11.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11.3">u</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11.4">k</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m11.5"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m11.6"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11.5">u</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11.6">v</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m11.7"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m11.8"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11.7">v</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11.8">l</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\xymatrix</ERROR>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\ar</ERROR>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m11.9"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m11.9">r</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">&amp;</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> intertwines the two representations <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{k}" text="pi _ k" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{l}" text="pi _ l" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
If <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{{u,\,v}}" text="S _ (list@(u, v))" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m14.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m14.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m14.1">u</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m14.2">v</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is non-zero, it follows from Schur’s Lemma
that <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{{u,\,v}}" text="S _ (list@(u, v))" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m15.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m15.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m15.1">u</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m15.2">v</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an isomorphism. The representations <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{k}" text="pi _ k" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
<!--  %**** String Line 825 **** --><Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{l}" text="pi _ l" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are thus isomorphically (and hence unitarily) equivalent. Since
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{k}" text="pi _ k" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{l}" text="pi _ l" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are not equivalent for <Math mode="inline" tex="k\neq l" text="k not-equals l" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, it follows
that <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{{u,\,v}}=0" text="S _ (list@(u, v)) = 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m21.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m21.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m21.1">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m21.2">v</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and hence <Math mode="inline" tex="T_{{u,\,v}}=0" text="T _ (list@(u, v)) = 0" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m22.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p3.m22.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m22.1">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m22.2">v</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="u\in I_{k}" text="u element-of I _ k" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="v\in I_{l}" text="v element-of I _ l" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">v</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as soon as <Math mode="inline" tex="k\neq l" text="k not-equals l" xml:id="S4.SS2.p3.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p4">
        <p>If now <Math mode="inline" tex="k=l" text="k = l" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the equalities <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{k}(g)\,S_{{u,\,v}}=S_{{u,\,v}}\,\pi_{k}(g)" text="pi _ k * g * S _ (list@(u, v)) = S _ (list@(u, v)) * pi _ k * g" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m2.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m2.5">g</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m2.1">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m2.2">v</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m2.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m2.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m2.3">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m2.4">v</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m2.6"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m2.6">g</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
for every <Math mode="inline" tex="g\in G" text="g element-of G" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and Schur’s Lemma again imply that <Math mode="inline" tex="S_{{u,\,v}}=\lambda_{{u,\,v}}\,i_{k}" text="S _ (list@(u, v)) = lambda _ (list@(u, v)) * i _ k" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m4.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m4.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m4.1">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m4.2">v</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m4.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m4.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m4.3">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m4.4">v</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some scalar <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda_{{u,\,v}}" text="lambda _ (list@(u, v))" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m5.1">u</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m5.2">v</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="i_{k}" text="i _ k" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the identity operator from <Math mode="inline" tex="K_{k}" text="K _ k" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> into itself. So <Math mode="inline" tex="T_{{u,\,v}}=\lambda_{{u,\,v}}\,U_{u,\,k}^{*}\,U_{v,\,k}" text="T _ (list@(u, v)) = lambda _ (list@(u, v)) * (U _ (list@(u, k))) ^ * * U _ (list@(v, k))" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m8.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m8.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m8.1">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m8.2">v</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m8.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m8.4"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m8.3">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m8.4">v</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m8.5"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m8.6"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m8.5">u</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m8.6">k</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m8.7"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p4.m8.8"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m8.7">v</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m8.8">k</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus any operator <Math mode="inline" tex="T\in{\textbf{{E}}}_{\pi}" text="T element-of [E] _ pi" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMText><text font="sansserif bold">E</text></XMText>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> satisfies the two conditions of the lemma. The converse is
obvious.

The proof of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_5.1"/> is now straightforward.
<ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>[Proof of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_5.1"/>]

        <p>Hence, for every <Math mode="inline" tex="A\in HS(H)" text="A element-of H * S * H" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m16">
            <XMath>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A" text="[P] _ pi * A" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m17">

                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the sum of the
<!--  %**** String Line 850 **** -->projections of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>

          </Math> on all the subspaces <Math mode="inline" tex="{\textbf{{E}}}_{{u,\,v}}" text="[E] _ (list@(u, v))" xml:id="S4.SS2.p4.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, i.e.</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex25">
          <Math mode="display" tex="{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\sum_{{{u,\,v}}\,\in I_{j}}\Bigl{%&#10;\langle}A,\dfrac{V_{{u,\,v}}}{||V_{{u,\,v}}||}\Bigr{\rangle}\,\dfrac{V_{{u,\,v%&#10;}}}{||V_{{u,\,v}}||}=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\,\dfrac{1}{d_{j}}\sum_{{{u,\,v}}\,\in I%&#10;_{j}}\emph{tr}\bigl{(}U_{v,\,j}^{*}\,U_{u,\,j}\,A_{u,\,v}\bigr{)}\,V_{{u,\,v}}," text="[P] _ pi * A = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@(list@(A, V _ (list@(u, v)) / norm@(V _ (list@(u, v)))) * (V _ (list@(u, v)) / norm@(V _ (list@(u, v)))))) = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@([tr] * (U _ (list@(v, j))) ^ * * U _ (list@(u, j)) * A _ (list@(u, v)) * V _ (list@(u, v))))" xml:id="S4.Ex25.m1">

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>which gives the formula we were looking for. We also have</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex26">
          <Math mode="display" tex="||{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A||^{2}=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\sum_{{{u,\,v}}\,\in I_{j}}%&#10;\Bigl{|}\Bigl{\langle}A,\dfrac{V_{{u,\,v}}}{||V_{{u,\,v}}||}\Bigr{\rangle}%&#10;\Bigr{|}^{2}=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\,\dfrac{1}{d_{j}}\sum_{{{u,\,v}}\,\in I_{j}}%&#10;\bigl{|}\emph{tr}\bigl{(}U_{v,\,j}^{*}\,U_{u,\,j}\,A_{u,\,v}\bigr{)}\bigr{|}^{%&#10;2}." text="(norm@([P] _ pi * A)) ^ 2 = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@((absolute-value@(list@(A, V _ (list@(u, v)) / norm@(V _ (list@(u, v)))))) ^ 2)) = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@((absolute-value@([tr] * (U _ (list@(v, j))) ^ * * U _ (list@(u, j)) * A _ (list@(u, v)))) ^ 2))" xml:id="S4.Ex26.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex26.m1.18"/>

                            </XMApp>

                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex26.m1.13">j</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                          <XMDual>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex26.m1.14"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex26.m1.15"/>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex26.m1.14">u</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex26.m1.15">v</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_corollary" inlist="thm theorem:corollary" labels="LABEL:Corollary_5.4" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem5">

        <para xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem5.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem5.p1.m1">

                <XMath>

                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, written
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{j\,\in J}\bigl{(}{\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{i\,%&#10;\in I_{j}}\pi{{}_{i,\,j}}\bigr{)}\!\!\!" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem5.p1.m4">

                </XMath>
              </Math>. Then</text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex27">
            <Math mode="display" tex="{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}A=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\,\dfrac{1}{d_{j}}\sum_{{{u,\,v}}\,\in I%&#10;_{j}}{{\langle{U_{u,\,j}\,x_{u,\,j}},{U_{v,\,j}\,y_{v,\,j}}\rangle}}\,\tau_{u,%&#10;\,j}\,U^{*}_{u,\,j}\,U_{v,\,j}\,P_{v,\,j}." text="[P] _ pi * A = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@(list@(U _ (list@(u, j)) * x _ (list@(u, j)), U _ (list@(v, j)) * y _ (list@(v, j))) * tau _ (list@(u, j)) * (U ^ *) _ (list@(u, j)) * U _ (list@(v, j)) * P _ (list@(v, j))))" xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.19"/>

                                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.15"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.16"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.15">v</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.16">j</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.17"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex27.m1.18"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.17">v</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex27.m1.18">j</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS2.p5">
        <p>For every <Math mode="inline" tex="{j\,\in J}" text="j element-of J" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="u,v\in I_{j}" text="list@(u, v) element-of I _ j" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m2.1">u</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m2.2">v</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
<Math mode="inline" tex="A_{{u,\,v}}={{\langle{\,\centerdot\,},{y_{v,\,j}}\rangle}}\,x_{u,\,j}" text="A _ (list@(u, v)) = list@(centerdot, y _ (list@(v, j))) * x _ (list@(u, j))" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.1">u</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.2">v</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.7"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.8"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                      <XMTok name="centerdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.7">∙</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.8">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.3">v</XMTok>

                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.4">j</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.5"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS2.p5.m3.6"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.5">u</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS2.p5.m3.6">j</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex28">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\textrm{tr}\bigl{(}U^{*}_{v,\,j}\,U_{u,\,j}\,A_{{u,\,v}}\bigr{)}={{\langle{U_{%&#10;u,\,j}\,x_{u,\,j}},{U_{v,\,j}\,y_{v,\,j}}\rangle}}." text="[tr] * (U ^ *) _ (list@(v, j)) * U _ (list@(u, j)) * A _ (list@(u, v)) = list@(U _ (list@(u, j)) * x _ (list@(u, j)), U _ (list@(v, j)) * y _ (list@(v, j)))" xml:id="S4.Ex28.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex28.m1.15"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex28.m1.15">

                            <XMApp>

                          <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex28.m1.9"/>

                              </XMApp>

                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex28.m1.9">u</XMTok>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex28.m1.11"/>

                              </XMApp>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex28.m1.13"/>

                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex28.m1.13">v</XMTok>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>The result then follows from Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_5.1"/>.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:Section_4.3" xml:id="S4.SS3">
      <tags>
        <tag>4.3</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection 4.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§4.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">4.3</tag>An abstract version of the Wiener Theorem.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS3.p1">
        <p>As recalled in Section <ref labelref="LABEL:Section_3"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\textbf{{E}}}_{\pi}" text="[E] _ pi" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMText><text font="sansserif bold">E</text></XMText>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the space
<!--  %**** String Line 900 **** -->of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vectors for the representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi{\otimes}{\overline{{\pi}}}" text="pi tensor-product overline@(pi)" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on
<Math mode="inline" tex="HS(H)" text="H * S * H" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">S</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m4.1">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where for every <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in H" text="list@(x, y) element-of H" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m5.2">y</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x{\otimes}{\overline{{y}}}" text="x tensor-product overline@(y)" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is identified with the rank-one
operator <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\langle{\,\centerdot\,},{y}\rangle}}\,x" text="list@(centerdot, y) * x" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="centerdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m7.1">∙</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m7.2">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For every pair
<Math mode="inline" tex="(x,y)" text="open-interval@(x, y)" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m8.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m8.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m8.1">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m8.2">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of vectors of <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="\boldsymbol{b}_{x,\,y}" text="b _ (list@(x, y))" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m10.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m10.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m10.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m10.2">y</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the element of
<Math mode="inline" tex="K{\otimes}K" text="K tensor-product K" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, with
<Math mode="inline" tex="K={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{\jnjK}{}_{j}" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\jnjK</ERROR>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUBSCRIPT" scriptpos="2">
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, defined by</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex29">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\boldsymbol{b}_{x,\,y}=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{d_{j}}}\,\Bigl{(}\,%&#10;\sum_{i\,\in I_{j}}x{{}_{i,\,j}}{\otimes}{\overline{{y}}}{{}_{i,\,j}}\Bigr{)}." xml:id="S4.Ex29.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>

              <XMWrap>

                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>

              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>It should be pointed out that for a fixed index <Math mode="inline" tex="j\in J" text="j element-of J" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the vectors
<Math mode="inline" tex="x{{}_{i,\,j}}" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUBSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m14.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m14.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m14.1">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m14.2">j</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y{{}_{i,\,j}}" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUBSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m15.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m15.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m15.1">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m15.2">j</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are
understood in the formula above as belonging to the same space <Math mode="inline" tex="K_{j}" text="K _ j" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
(and not to the various orthogonal spaces <Math mode="inline" tex="H{{}_{i,\,j}}" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUBSCRIPT" scriptpos="3">
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m17.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m17.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m17.1">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m17.2">j</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>). So <Math mode="inline" tex="\boldsymbol{b}_{x,\,y}" text="b _ (list@(x, y))" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m18.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS3.p1.m18.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m18.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m18.2">y</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is a
vector of <Math mode="inline" tex="K{\otimes}K" text="K tensor-product K" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, not of <Math mode="inline" tex="H{\otimes}H" text="H tensor-product H" xml:id="S4.SS3.p1.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex30">
          <Math mode="display" tex="||\boldsymbol{b}_{x,\,y}||^{2}=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\dfrac{1}{{d_{j}}}\sum_{{{u,\,%&#10;v}}\,\in I_{j}}{{\langle{x_{u,\,j}},{x_{v,\,j}}\rangle}}\,{\overline{{{{%&#10;\langle{y_{u,\,j}},{y_{v,\,j}}\rangle}}}}}." text="(norm@(b _ (list@(x, y)))) ^ 2 = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@(list@(x _ (list@(u, j)), x _ (list@(v, j))) * overline@(list@(y _ (list@(u, j)), y _ (list@(v, j))))))" xml:id="S4.Ex30.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex30.m1.15"/>

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Combining Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:Corollary_5.4"/> with the formula</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex31">
          <Math mode="display" tex="m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{\pi(\,\centerdot\,)x},{y}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr{)}={{\langle{%&#10;P_{\pi{\otimes}\,{\overline{{\vphantom{t}\pi}}}}\,\,x{\otimes}{\overline{{x}}}%&#10;},{y{\otimes}{\overline{{y}}}\,}\rangle}}={{\langle{{\textbf{{P}}}_{\pi}{{%&#10;\langle{\,\centerdot\,},{x}\rangle}}x},{{{\langle{\,\centerdot\,},{y}\rangle}}%&#10;{y}}\rangle}}" text="m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 = list@((P _ (pi tensor-product overline@(pi)) * x) tensor-product overline@(x), y tensor-product overline@(y)) = list@([P] _ pi * list@(centerdot, x) * x, list@(centerdot, y) * y)" xml:id="S4.Ex31.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex31.m1.7"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex31.m1.7">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex31.m1.7.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex31.m1.7.1">
                              <XMApp>

      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_corollary" inlist="thm theorem:corollary" labels="LABEL:Corollary_5.5" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem6">
        <tags>
          <tag>Corollary 4.6</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">4.6</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.6</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 4.6</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 4.6</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem6.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem6.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a compact representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem6.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem6.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, written in the form
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{j\,\in J}\bigl{(}{\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{i\,%&#10;\in I_{j}}\pi{{}_{i,\,j}}\bigr{)}" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem6.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                </XMath>
              </Math> as in Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_5.1"/>. For every vectors

              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{\pi(\,\centerdot\,)x},{y}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr%&#10;{)}=\sum_{j\,\in J}\dfrac{1}{{d_{j}}}\sum_{{{u,\,v}}\,\in I_{j}}{{\langle{U_{u%&#10;,\,j}\,x_{u,\,j}},{U_{v,\,j}\,x_{v,\,j}}\rangle}}\,.\,{\overline{{{{\langle{U_%&#10;{u,\,j}\,y_{u,\,j}},{U_{v,\,j}\,y_{v,\,j}}\rangle}}}}}" text="formulae@(m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@(list@(U _ (list@(u, j)) * x _ (list@(u, j)), U _ (list@(v, j)) * x _ (list@(v, j))))), overline@(list@(U _ (list@(u, j)) * y _ (list@(u, j)), U _ (list@(v, j)) * y _ (list@(v, j)))))" xml:id="S4.E6.m3">
                  <XMath>

                    </Math></td>
                </MathBranch>
              </MathFork>
            </equation>
            <equation xml:id="S4.Ex32">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle=||\boldsymbol{b}_{\,Ux,\,Uy}||^{2}." text="absent = (norm@(b _ (list@(U * x, U * y)))) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex32.m3">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex32.m3.3"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex32.m3.3">
                          <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex32.m3.3.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex32.m3.3.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex32.m3.1"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex32.m3.2"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex32.m3.1">
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="1.7pt" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex32.m3.2">
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
                <MathBranch>
                  <td align="right"/>
                  <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=||\boldsymbol{b}_{\,Ux,\,Uy}||^{2}." text="absent = (norm@(b _ (list@(U * x, U * y)))) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex32.m2">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex32.m2.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex32.m2.3">
                              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex32.m2.3.1"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex32.m2.3.1">
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex32.m2.1"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex32.m2.2"/>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex32.m2.1">
                                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="1.7pt" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex32.m2.2">
                                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                          </XMApp>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMath>
                    </Math></td>
                </MathBranch>
              </MathFork>
            </equation>
          </equationgroup>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS3.p2">
        <p>We thus obtain the following abstract version of the Wiener Theorem for
unitary representations of a group <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.SS3.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>:</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_theorem" inlist="thm theorem:theorem" labels="LABEL:Theorem_5.6" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7">
        <tags>
          <tag>Theorem 4.7</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">Theorem 4.7</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.7</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 4.7</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 4.7</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a unitary representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on a Hilbert
space <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.
<!--  %**** String Line 950 **** -->We decompose <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="H=H_{w}{\mathop{\oplus}}H_{c}" text="H = H _ w * direct-sum@(H _ c)" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi=\pi_{w}{\mathop{\oplus}}\pi_{c}" text="pi = pi _ w * direct-sum@(pi _ c)" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, where
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{w}" text="pi _ w" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">w</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is the weakly mixing part of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{c}" text="pi _ c" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> its compact part. Writing <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{c}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{j\,\in J}\bigl{(}{\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{i%&#10;\,\in I_{j}}\pi{{}_{i,\,j}}\bigr{)}" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="pre4"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m11.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m11.2"/>
                        </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMath>
              </Math> as in Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:Corollary_5.5"/> above, we have for every
vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y" text="list@(x, y)" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m12">
                <XMath>

                    <XMApp>
