                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m13">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, written respectively <Math mode="inline" tex="x=x_{w}{\mathop{\oplus}}x_{c}" text="x = x _ w * direct-sum@(x _ c)" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m14">
                <XMath>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>

              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y=y_{w}{\mathop{\oplus}}y_{c}" text="y = y _ w * direct-sum@(y _ c)" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m15">

              </Math> with respect to the decomposition <Math mode="inline" tex="H=H_{w}{\mathop{\oplus}}H_{c}" text="H = H _ w * direct-sum@(H _ c)" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem7.p1.m16">

          <equation labels="LABEL:Eq4" xml:id="S4.E7">
            <tags>
              <tag>(7)</tag>
              <tag role="autoref"><text font="italic">Equation 7</text></tag>
              <tag role="refnum">7</tag>
            </tags>
            <Math mode="display" tex="m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{\pi(\,\centerdot\,)x},{y}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr{)}=||\,%&#10;\boldsymbol{b}_{\,Ux_{c},\,Uy_{c}}||^{2}." text="m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 = (norm@(b _ (list@(U * x _ c, U * y _ c)))) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.E7.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.5"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.E7.m1.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.5.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.E7.m1.5.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.5.1.1"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual xml:id="S4.E7.m1.5.1.1">
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.5.1.1.1"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.4"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.E7.m1.5.1.1.1">
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                                        <XMDual>
                                          <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.3"/>
                                          <XMWrap>
                                            <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok name="centerdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="S4.E7.m1.3">∙</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>
                                        </XMDual>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E7.m1.4">y</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.5.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.E7.m1.5.2">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.1"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.E7.m1.2"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.E7.m1.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="1.7pt" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.E7.m1.2">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">c</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS3.p3">
        <p>This follows directly from the facts that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex33">
          <Math mode="display" tex="m(|{{\langle{\pi(\,\centerdot\,)x},{y}\rangle}}|^{2})=m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{\pi_%&#10;{w}(\,\centerdot\,)x_{w}},{y_{w}}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr{)}+m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{%&#10;\pi_{c}(\,\centerdot\,)x_{c}},{y_{c}}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr{)}" text="m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 = m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi _ w * centerdot * x _ w, y _ w))) ^ 2 + m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi _ c * centerdot * x _ c, y _ c))) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex33.m1">

and from Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:Corollary_5.5"/>.</p>

      <para xml:id="S4.SS3.p4">

result, to be given in Section <ref labelref="LABEL:Section_5"/>. We will also need an

            <XMath>

            </XMath>
          </Math>, which is a direct consequence of Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:Corollary_5.5"/>. Using the same notation as in the statement of Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:Corollary_5.5"/>, we
denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="x={\mathop{\oplus}}_{j\,\in J}{\widetilde{{x}}}_{j}" text="x = (direct-sum _ (j element-of J))@((widetilde@(x)) _ j)" xml:id="S4.SS3.p4.m3">
            <XMath>

            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                    <XMApp>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the
respective decompositions of the vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S4.SS3.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>

            <XMath>

            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with respect
to the decomposition <Math mode="inline" tex="H={\mathop{\oplus}}_{j\,\in J}{\widetilde{{H}}}_{j}" text="H = (direct-sum _ (j element-of J))@((widetilde@(H)) _ j)" xml:id="S4.SS3.p4.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.SS3.p4.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then we have</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_corollary" inlist="thm theorem:corollary" labels="LABEL:Corollary_5.7" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem8">
        <tags>
          <tag>Corollary 4.8</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">4.8</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.8</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 4.8</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 4.8</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem8.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem8.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a compact representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem8.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem8.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.
Under the assumptions of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_5.6"/>, we have for every
vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem8.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y" text="y" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem8.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem8.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math></text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex34">
            <Math mode="display" tex="m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{\pi(\,\centerdot\,)x},{y}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr{)}\leq\sum_{j%&#10;\,\in J}\,\dfrac{1}{{d_{j}}}\,||{\widetilde{{x}}}_{j}||^{2}.\,||{\widetilde{{y%&#10;}}}_{j}||^{2}\leq\sum_{j\,\in J}\,||{\widetilde{{x}}}_{j}||^{2}.\,||{%&#10;\widetilde{{y}}}_{j}||^{2}." text="formulae@(m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 less= (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (norm@((widetilde@(x)) _ j)) ^ 2), (norm@((widetilde@(y)) _ j)) ^ 2 less= (sum _ (j element-of J))@((norm@((widetilde@(x)) _ j)) ^ 2), (norm@((widetilde@(y)) _ j)) ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.Ex34.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex34.m1.3"/>

      <ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS3.p5">
        <p>Applying the Cauchy-Schwarz inequality twice to (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq3bis"/>) yields that</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A1.EGx3">
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex35">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{\pi(\,\centerdot\,)x},{y}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr%&#10;{)}\leq\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\dfrac{1}{{d_{j}}}\,\sum_{{{u,\,v}}\,\in I_{j}}||x_{u,%&#10;\,j}||\,.\,||x_{v,\,j}||\,.\,||y_{u,\,j}||\,.\,||y_{v,\,j}||" text="formulae@(m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 less= (sum _ (j element-of J))@((1 / d _ j) * (sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@(norm@(x _ (list@(u, j))))), norm@(x _ (list@(v, j))), norm@(y _ (list@(u, j))), norm@(y _ (list@(v, j))))" xml:id="S4.Ex35.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex35.m3.13"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex35.m3.14"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex35.m3.15"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex35.m3.16"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex35.m3.13">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>

                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex38.m2.1.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex38.m2.1.1">
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PERIOD" rpadding="1.7pt">.</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex38.m2.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex38.m2.2.1"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex38.m2.2.1">
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid8"/>
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex38.m2.2.2"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex38.m2.2.2">
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PERIOD" rpadding="1.7pt">.</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex38.m2.3">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex38.m2.3.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex38.m2.3.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>since <Math mode="inline" tex="d_{j}\geq 1" text="d _ j &gt;= 1" xml:id="S4.SS3.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="j\in J" text="j element-of J" xml:id="S4.SS3.p5.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:Section_4.4" xml:id="S4.SS4">
      <tags>
        <tag>4.4</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection 4.4</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">4.4</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§4.4</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">4.4</tag>Why is (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq4"/>) an abstract version of the Wiener
Theorem?</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS4.p1">
        <p>Recall that
the classic Wiener Theorem states that for any probability measure
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on the unit
circle <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{T}}" text="T" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:Eq5" xml:id="S4.E8">
          <tags>
            <tag>(8)</tag>
            <tag role="autoref">Equation 8</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">8</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\xymatrix@C=60pt{\dfrac{1}{2N+1}{\displaystyle}\sum_{n=-N}^{N}|\,\widehat{%&#10;\sigma}(n)|^{2}\ar[r]\ar@{}@&lt;.6ex&gt;[r]_{-}{\smash[b]{\xymatrix@C=13pt{%&#10;\scriptstyle N\ar[r]&amp;\scriptstyle+\infty}}}&amp;{\displaystyle}\sum_{\lambda\,\in%&#10;\,{\mathbb{T}}}\,\sigma(\{\lambda\})^{2}}." text="[\xymatrix] * @ * C = 60 * p * t * (1 / (2 * N + 1)) * ((sum _ (n = - N)) ^ N)@((absolute-value@(widehat@(sigma) * n)) ^ 2 * [\ar] * delimited-[]@(r) * [\ar] * @ * @ * expectation@(.6 * e * x) * (delimited-[]@(r)) _ - * [\xymatrix] * [@C=13ptN\ar[r]&amp;+] * infinity * &amp; * (sum _ (lambda element-of T))@(sigma * (set@(lambda)) ^ 2))" xml:id="S4.E8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.E8.m1.5">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <ERROR class="undefined">\xymatrix</ERROR>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">@</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="60" role="NUMBER">60</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.5.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.E8.m1.5.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.1"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E8.m1.1">n</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <ERROR class="undefined">\ar</ERROR>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E8.m1.2">r</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <ERROR class="undefined">\ar</ERROR>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">@</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">@</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="expectation"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.5.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="OPEN">&lt;</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.E8.m1.5.2">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning=".6" role="NUMBER">.6</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>

                            </XMWrap>

                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <ERROR class="undefined">\xymatrix</ERROR>
                          <XMText>@C=13pt<text fontsize="70%">N<ERROR class="undefined">\ar</ERROR>[r]&amp;+</text></XMText>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">&amp;</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.5.3"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual xml:id="S4.E8.m1.5.3">
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S4.E8.m1.4"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.E8.m1.4">λ</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>The operator <Math mode="inline" tex="M_{\sigma}" text="M _ sigma" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of multiplication by <Math mode="inline" tex="e^{i\theta}" text="e ^ (i * theta)" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{T}},\sigma)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T, sigma)" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m5.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m5.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m5.1">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m5.2">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is unitary, and thus induces a unitary representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{\sigma}" text="pi _ sigma" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}" text="Z" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{T}},\sigma)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T, sigma)" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m8.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m8.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m8.1">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m8.2">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Its compact part <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{\sigma_{d}}" text="pi _ sigma _ d" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is induced by
the multiplication operator by <Math mode="inline" tex="e^{i\theta}" text="e ^ (i * theta)" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{T}},\sigma_{d})" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T, sigma _ d)" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m11.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m11.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m11.1">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m11.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
where <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d}" text="sigma _ d" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the discrete part of <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>: <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{d}=\sum_{\lambda\,\in\,D}\sigma(\{\lambda\})\delta{}_{\lambda}" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m14.1">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUBSCRIPT" scriptpos="2">
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, with <Math mode="inline" tex="D=\{\lambda\in{\mathbb{T}}\,;\,\sigma(\{\lambda\})&gt;0\}" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">T</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m15.1">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We
have <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{T}},\sigma_{d})={\mathop{\oplus}}_{\lambda\,\in\,D}L^{2}({%&#10;\mathbb{T}},\sigma(\{\lambda\})\delta_{\lambda})" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T, sigma _ d) = (direct-sum _ (lambda element-of D))@(L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T, sigma * set@(lambda) * delta _ lambda))" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m16.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m16.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m16.1">T</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m16.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m16.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m16.5"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m16.3">T</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m16.5">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m16.5.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMDual xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m16.5.1">
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m16.2"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m16.2">λ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{\sigma_{d}}={\mathop{\oplus}}_{\lambda\,\in\,D}\pi_{\delta_{\lambda}}" text="pi _ sigma _ d = (direct-sum _ (lambda element-of D))@(pi _ delta _ lambda)" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where each <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{\delta_{\lambda}}" text="pi _ delta _ lambda" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the one-dimensional irreducible representation on
<Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{T}},\sigma(\{\lambda\})\delta_{\lambda})" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T, sigma * set@(lambda) * delta _ lambda)" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m19.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m19.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m19.2">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m19.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m19.3.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m19.3.1">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m19.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m19.1">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> given by
multiplication by <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The representations <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{\delta_{\lambda}}" text="pi _ delta _ lambda" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are pairwise non-equivalent. Hence the operator <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (defined in
Section <ref labelref="LABEL:Section_4.1"/>) involved in the
decomposition of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{\sigma_{d}}" text="pi _ sigma _ d" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as a direct sum of irreducible representations is equal to the identity
operator on
<Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{T}},\sigma)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T, sigma)" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m24.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m24.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m24.1">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m24.2">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and we have for every functions <Math mode="inline" tex="f" text="f" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="g" text="g" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of
<Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{T}},\sigma)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(T, sigma)" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m27">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m27.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p1.m27.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m27.1">T</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m27.2">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex39">
          <Math mode="display" tex="||\,\boldsymbol{b}_{f,\,g}||^{2}=\sum_{\lambda\,\in\,D}|\,f(\lambda)\,|^{2}.\,%&#10;|g(\lambda)\,|^{2}.\,\sigma(\{\lambda\})^{2}." text="formulae@((norm@(b _ (list@(f, g)))) ^ 2 = (sum _ (lambda element-of D))@((absolute-value@(f * lambda)) ^ 2), (absolute-value@(g * lambda)) ^ 2, sigma * (set@(lambda)) ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.Ex39.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex39.m1.6">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.6.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.6.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.6.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex39.m1.6.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.6.1.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex39.m1.6.1.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.1"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.2"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex39.m1.1">f</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex39.m1.2">g</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">λ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.6.1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex39.m1.6.1.2">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.3"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                    </XMWrap>

                            </XMDual>

                        </XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="PERIOD" rpadding="1.7pt">.</XMTok>

                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>

                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.4"/>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex39.m1.6.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex39.m1.6.3.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Applying Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_5.6"/> to the functions <Math mode="inline" tex="f=g=1" text="f = g = 1" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
remembering that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex40">
          <Math mode="display" tex="m(F)=\lim_{N\to+\infty}\dfrac{1}{2N+1}\sum_{n=-N}^{N}F(n)" text="m * F = (limit _ (N to + infinity))@((1 / (2 * N + 1)) * ((sum _ (n = - N)) ^ N)@(F * n))" xml:id="S4.Ex40.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>for every <Math mode="inline" tex="F\in\mbox{WAP({$\mathbb{Z}$})}" text="F element-of [WAP(Z)]" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                <XMText>WAP(<Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbb{Z}" text="Z" xml:id="S4.SS4.p1.m29.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>)</XMText>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> yields (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq5"/>).
<!--  %**** String Line 1050 **** --></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS4.p2">
        <p>As seen above in the case where <Math mode="inline" tex="G={\mathbb{Z}}" text="G = Z" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_5.6"/> admits a
much simpler formulation in the case where <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an abelian group: all
irreducible representations are one-dimensional and either equal or
non-equivalent, so that <Math mode="inline" tex="U" text="U" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the identity operator on <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a compact representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the formula
(<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq3bis"/>) thus becomes
in this case</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex41">
          <Math mode="display" tex="m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{\pi(\,\centerdot\,)x},{y}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr{)}=\sum_{j\,%&#10;\in J}\ \sum_{{{u,\,v}}\,\in\,I_{j}}x_{u,\,j}\,{\overline{{x}}}_{v,\,j}\,{%&#10;\overline{{y}}}_{u,\,j}y_{v,\,j}" text="m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((sum _ (list@(u, v) element-of I _ j))@(x _ (list@(u, j)) * (overline@(x)) _ (list@(v, j)) * (overline@(y)) _ (list@(u, j)) * y _ (list@(v, j))))" xml:id="S4.Ex41.m1">

        <p>since <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{i,\,j}" text="x _ (list@(i, j))" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p2.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p2.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m7.1">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m7.2">j</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="y_{i,\,j}" text="y _ (list@(i, j))" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p2.m8.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.SS4.p2.m8.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m8.1">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m8.2">j</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="i\in I_{j}" text="i element-of I _ j" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{j\,\in J}" text="j element-of J" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, are simply
scalars.
Using the notation of Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:Corollary_5.7"/>, we have</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:Eq6" xml:id="S4.E9">
          <tags>
            <tag>(9)</tag>
            <tag role="autoref">Equation 9</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">9</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{\pi(\,\centerdot\,)x},{y}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr{)}=\sum_{j\,%&#10;\in J}\,\Bigl{|}\sum_{u\,\in\,I_{j}}x_{u,\,j}\,{\overline{{y}}}_{u,\,j}\Bigr{|%&#10;}^{2}=\sum_{j\,\in J}\,\bigl{|}{{\langle{{\widetilde{{x}}}_{j}},{{\widetilde{{%&#10;y}}}_{j}}\rangle}}\bigr{|}^{2}\!." text="m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((absolute-value@((sum _ (u element-of I _ j))@(x _ (list@(u, j)) * (overline@(y)) _ (list@(u, j))))) ^ 2) = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((absolute-value@(list@((widetilde@(x)) _ j, (widetilde@(y)) _ j))) ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.E9.m1">

dual

        <p>and by <Math mode="inline" tex="P_{\chi}" text="P _ chi" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

          </Math>
the orthogonal projection of <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>

            <XMath>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Each representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{j}" text="pi _ j" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="j\in J" text="j element-of J" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, being in fact a character <Math mode="inline" tex="\chi_{j}" text="chi _ j" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on the group <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we can identify the space <Math mode="inline" tex="{\widetilde{{H}}}_{j}" text="(widetilde@(H)) _ j" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with
<Math mode="inline" tex="E_{\chi_{j}}" text="E _ chi _ j" xml:id="S4.SS4.p2.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">E</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="chi" role="UNKNOWN">χ</XMTok>
