                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq6"/>) then yields the following corollary:</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_corollary" inlist="thm theorem:corollary" labels="LABEL:cor+" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem9">
        <tags>
          <tag>Corollary 4.9</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">4.9</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">4.9</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 4.9</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 4.9</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be an abelian group, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on a Hilbert space <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Then we have for every <Math mode="inline" tex="x,y\in H" text="list@(x, y) element-of H" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1.m5.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1.m5.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Thmtheorem9.p1.m5.2">y</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math></text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex43">
            <Math mode="display" tex="m\bigl{(}|{{\langle{\pi(\,\centerdot\,)x},{y}\rangle}}|^{2}\bigr{)}=\sum_{j\,%&#10;\in J}\,\bigl{|}{{\langle{P_{E_{\chi_{j}}}x},{P_{E_{\chi_{j}}}y}\rangle}}\bigr%&#10;{|}^{2}=\sum_{\chi\,\in\,\Gamma}\,\bigl{|}{{\langle{P_{E_{\chi}}x},{P_{E_{\chi%&#10;}}y}\rangle}}\bigr{|}^{2}\!." text="m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 = (sum _ (j element-of J))@((absolute-value@(list@(P _ E _ chi _ j * x, P _ E _ chi _ j * y))) ^ 2) = (sum _ (chi element-of Gamma))@((absolute-value@(list@(P _ E _ chi * x, P _ E _ chi * y))) ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.Ex43.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex43.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex43.m1.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex43.m1.3.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex43.m1.3.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex43.m1.3.1.1"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex43.m1.3.1.1">
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex43.m1.3.1.1.1"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex43.m1.2"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex43.m1.3.1.1.1">
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                                        <XMDual>
                                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex43.m1.1"/>
                                          <XMWrap>
                                            <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok name="centerdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="S4.Ex43.m1.1">∙</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex45.m1.7"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex45.m1.7">r</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <ERROR class="undefined">\xymatrix</ERROR>
                          <XMText>@C=13pt<text fontsize="70%">N<ERROR class="undefined">\ar</ERROR>[r]&amp;+</text></XMText>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">&amp;</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid3"/>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">λ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp rpadding="-1.7pt">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex45.m1.8.3"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex45.m1.8.3">
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex45.m1.8.3.1"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex45.m1.8.3.2"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex45.m1.8.3.1">
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">P</XMTok>

                                            <XMApp>

                                            </XMApp>

                                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                                                  <XMApp>
                                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>

                                                    </XMApp>
                                                  </XMApp>
                                                </XMApp>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                              </XMWrap>
                                            </XMApp>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex45.m1.8.3.2">
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>

                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="kernel" role="OPFUNCTION" xml:id="S4.Ex45.m1.3">ker</XMTok>
                                              <XMWrap>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex45.m1.4">
                                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                                                  <XMApp>
                                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                                                    <XMApp>
                                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>
                                                      <XMText><text fontsize="70%">Id</text></XMText>

                                                    </XMApp>

                                                </XMApp>

                                              </XMWrap>

                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>

                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>In particular, we have</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex46">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\xymatrix@C=60pt{\dfrac{1}{2N+1}{\displaystyle}\sum_{n=-N}^{N}\,\bigl{|}{{%&#10;\langle{U^{n}x},{x}\rangle}}\bigr{|}^{2}\ar[r]\ar@{}@&lt;.6ex&gt;[r]_{-}{\smash[b]{%&#10;\xymatrix@C=13pt{\scriptstyle N\ar[r]&amp;\scriptstyle+\infty}}}&amp;{\displaystyle}%&#10;\sum_{\lambda\,\in\,{\mathbb{T}}}\,\bigl{|}\bigl{|}P_{\ker(U-\lambda\textrm{Id%&#10;}_{H})}x\bigr{|}\bigr{|}^{4}\!.}" text="[\xymatrix] * @ * C = 60 * p * t * (1 / (2 * N + 1)) * ((sum _ (n = - N)) ^ N)@((absolute-value@(list@(U ^ n * x, x))) ^ 2 * [\ar] * delimited-[]@(r) * [\ar] * @ * @ * expectation@(.6 * e * x) * (delimited-[]@(r)) _ - * [\xymatrix] * [@C=13ptN\ar[r]&amp;+] * infinity * &amp; * (sum _ (lambda element-of T))@((absolute-value@(absolute-value@(P _ (kernel@(U - lambda * [Id] _ H)) * x))) ^ 4))" xml:id="S4.Ex46.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex46.m1.6"/>

                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>

              </XMDual>

          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS4.p4">
        <p>We refer the reader to <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="AnBi,Ballo,BalloGold,BjFi,Farkas" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> and the references therein for related
aspects and generalizations of the Wiener Theorem.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S4.SS4.p5">
        <p>We now have all the necessary tools for the proof of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_0"/>, which we present in the next section.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
  </section>
  <section inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:Section_5" xml:id="S5">
    <tags>
      <tag>5</tag>
      <tag role="autoref">section 5</tag>
      <tag role="refnum">5</tag>
      <tag role="typerefnum">§5</tag>
    </tags>
    <title><tag close=" ">5</tag>Proof of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_0"/></title>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:Section_5.1" xml:id="S5.SS1">
      <tags>
        <tag>5.1</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection 5.1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">5.1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§5.1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">5.1</tag>Notation</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p1">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="(W_{n})_{n\geq 1}" text="W _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p1.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be an increasing sequence of subsets of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> satisfying the
assumptions of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_0"/>, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
For each <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the set <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}=W_{n}\cup Q" text="Q _ n = W _ n union Q" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Remark that <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the increasing union of the sets
<Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS1.p2">
        <p>In order to prove Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_0"/>, we argue by contradiction, and
suppose that property (<ref labelref="LABEL:Pro1"/>) of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_0"/> holds true,
while <Math mode="inline" tex="Q_{n}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a non-Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We will
then
construct for every <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon&gt;0" text="varepsilon &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> a representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which
admits a <Math mode="inline" tex="(Q,\varepsilon)" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p2.m7.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p2.m7.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m7.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m7.2">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector, but is weakly mixing (which,
by Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_4.1"/>, is equivalent to the fact that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has no finite dimensional subrepresentation), and this will contradict
<!--  %**** String Line 1150 **** -->(<ref labelref="LABEL:Pro1"/>). We denote by <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon_{0}" text="varepsilon _ 0" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> a positive constant such
that assumption (<ref labelref="LABEL:Pro1"/>) holds true: any representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
admitting a <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q},\varepsilon_{0})" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon _ 0)" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p2.m11.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS1.p2.m11.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m11.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS1.p2.m11.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector has a
finite dimensional subrepresentation.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:Section_5.2" xml:id="S5.SS2">
      <tags>
        <tag>5.2</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection 5.2</tag>

        <tag role="typerefnum">§5.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">5.2</tag>Construction of a sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi_{n})_{n\geq 1}" text="pi _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.SS2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.m1.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> of
finite dimensional representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.m2">
          <XMath>
            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
          </XMath>
        </Math></title>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS2.p1">
        <p>The first step of the proof is to show that assumption (<ref labelref="LABEL:Pro1"/>)
combined with the
hypothesis that <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a non-Kazhdan set for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS2.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implies the
existence of sequences of finite dimensional representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with
certain properties.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:Lemma_6.1" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma 5.1</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">5.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">5.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 5.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 5.1</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">For every sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="(\varepsilon_{n})_{n\geq 1}" text="varepsilon _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1.m1">

                </XMath>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1.m2.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                        </XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>,
there exist a sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="(H_{n})_{n\geq 1}" text="H _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of finite dimensional Hilbert
spaces and a sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi_{n})_{n\geq 1}" text="pi _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>

                        </XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of unitary representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> such that for every <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq 1" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{n}" text="pi _ n" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is a representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="{H_{n}}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem1.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> with the following two properties:</text></p>
          <enumerate xml:id="S5.I1">
            <item xml:id="S5.I1.ix11">
              <tags>
                <tag>–</tag>
                <tag role="autoref"><text font="italic">item </text></tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">item –</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="S5.I1.ix11.p1">
                <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{n}" text="pi _ n" xml:id="S5.I1.ix11.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic"> has no non-zero </text><Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.I1.ix11.p1.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic">-invariant vector;</text></p>
              </para>
            </item>
            <item xml:id="S5.I1.ix12">
              <tags>
                <tag>–</tag>
                <tag role="autoref"><text font="italic">item </text></tag>
                <tag role="typerefnum">item –</tag>
              </tags>
              <para xml:id="S5.I1.ix12.p1">
                <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{n}" text="pi _ n" xml:id="S5.I1.ix12.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic"> has </text><Math mode="inline" tex="({Q_{n}},{\varepsilon_{n}})" text="open-interval@(Q _ n, varepsilon _ n)" xml:id="S5.I1.ix12.p1.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.I1.ix12.p1.m2.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic">-invariant unit vector
</text><Math mode="inline" tex="{a_{n}}\in H_{n}" text="a _ n element-of H _ n" xml:id="S5.I1.ix12.p1.m3">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic">: </text><Math mode="inline" tex="||{a_{n}}||=1" text="norm@(a _ n) = 1" xml:id="S5.I1.ix12.p1.m4">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.I1.ix12.p1.m4.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.I1.ix12.p1.m4.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic"> and</text></p>
                <equation xml:id="S5.Ex47">
                  <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{g\,\in\,{Q_{n}}}||\,\pi_{n}(g){a_{n}}-{a_{n}}||&lt;{\varepsilon_{n}}." text="(supremum _ (g element-of Q _ n))@(norm@(pi _ n * g * a _ n - a _ n)) less varepsilon _ n" xml:id="S5.Ex47.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex47.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex47.m1.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                                <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">g</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex47.m1.2.1"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex47.m1.2.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex47.m1.1"/>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex47.m1.1">g</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math>
                </equation>
<!--  %**** String Line 1175 **** -->              </para>
            </item>
          </enumerate>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS2.p2">
        <p>[Proof of Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:Lemma_6.1"/>] Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a not a Kazhdan set in
<Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, there exists a representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n}" text="rho _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on a Hilbert space
<Math mode="inline" tex="{K_{n}}" text="K _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which has no non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector, but is such that there
exists a unit vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{x_{n}}\in{K_{n}}" text="x _ n element-of K _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex48">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{g\,\in\,{Q_{n}}}||\,\rho_{n}(g){x_{n}}-{x_{n}}||&lt;{\varepsilon_{n}}." text="(supremum _ (g element-of Q _ n))@(norm@(rho _ n * g * x _ n - x _ n)) less varepsilon _ n" xml:id="S5.Ex48.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex48.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex48.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex48.m1.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                              </XMApp>

                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex48.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex48.m1.1">g</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="{\varepsilon_{n}}\leq\varepsilon_{0}" text="varepsilon _ n less= varepsilon _ 0" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, assumption (<ref labelref="LABEL:Pro1"/>)
implies that <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n}" text="rho _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has a finite dimensional subrepresentation.
By Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_4.1"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n}" text="rho _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not weakly mixing. This
means that if we decompose <Math mode="inline" tex="K_{n}" text="K _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="K_{n}=K_{n,\,w}{\mathop{\oplus}}K_{n,\,c}" text="K _ n = K _ (list@(n, w)) * direct-sum@(K _ (list@(n, c)))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m13.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m13.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m13.1">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m13.2">w</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m13.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m13.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m13.3">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m13.4">c</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n}" text="rho _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>

          </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n}=\rho_{n,\,w}{\mathop{\oplus}}\rho_{n,\,c}" text="rho _ n = rho _ (list@(n, w)) * direct-sum@(rho _ (list@(n, c)))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m15.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m15.2"/>

                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m15.1">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m15.2">w</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m15.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m15.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m15.3">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m15.4">c</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where
<Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,w}" text="rho _ (list@(n, w))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>
