                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m16.2">w</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,c}" text="rho _ (list@(n, c))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m17.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m17.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m17.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m17.2">c</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are respectively
the weakly mixing and compact parts of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,c}" text="rho _ (list@(n, c))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m19.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m19.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m19.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m19.2">c</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a non-zero
representation. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n}" text="rho _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has no non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector,
neither have <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,w}" text="rho _ (list@(n, w))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m22.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m22.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m22.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m22.2">w</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> nor <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,c}" text="rho _ (list@(n, c))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m23.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p2.m23.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m23.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p2.m23.2">c</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS2.p3">
        <p>Decomposing <Math mode="inline" tex="{x_{n}}" text="x _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="{x_{n}}=x_{n,\,w}{\mathop{\oplus}}x_{n,\,c}" text="x _ n = x _ (list@(n, w)) * direct-sum@(x _ (list@(n, c)))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m2.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m2.1">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m2.2">w</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m2.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m2.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m2.3">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m2.4">c</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have
<Math mode="inline" tex="1=||x_{n,\,w}||^{2}+||x_{n,\,c}||^{2}" text="1 = (norm@(x _ (list@(n, w)))) ^ 2 + (norm@(x _ (list@(n, c)))) ^ 2" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m3.5"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m3.5">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m3.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m3.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m3.1">n</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m3.2">w</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m3.6"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m3.6">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m3.3"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m3.4"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m3.3">n</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m3.4">c</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We claim that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\underline{\lim}_{\,n\to+\infty}\,||\,x_{n,\,c}||&gt;0" text="(underline@(limit)) _ (n to + infinity) * norm@(x _ (list@(n, c))) &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">lim</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="1.7pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m4.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m4.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m4.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m4.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m4.1">n</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m4.2">c</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Indeed, suppose
that it is not the case. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\overline{\lim}_{\,n\to+\infty}||x_{n,\,w}||=1" text="(overline@(limit)) _ (n to + infinity) * norm@(x _ (list@(n, w))) = 1" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">lim</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="1.7pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m5.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m5.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m5.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m5.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m5.1">n</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m5.2">w</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="||\rho_{n}(g){x_{n}}-{x_{n}}||^{2}=||\rho{}_{n,\,w}(g)x_{n,\,w}-x_{n,\,w}||^{2%&#10;}+||\rho_{n,\,c}(g)x_{n,\,c}-x_{n,\,c}||^{2}" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.13">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="pre2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.2">w</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.3">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.4">w</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.5">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.6">w</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.7"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.8"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.7">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.8">c</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.9"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.10"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.9">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.10">c</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.11"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m6.12"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.11">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m6.12">c</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="g\in G" text="g element-of G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A1.EGx4">
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex49">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle\sup_{g\,\in\,Q_{n}}||\rho_{n,\,w}(g)x_{n,\,w}-x_{n,\,w}||&lt;{%&#10;\varepsilon_{n}}," text="(supremum _ (g element-of Q _ n))@(norm@(rho _ (list@(n, w)) * g * x _ (list@(n, w)) - x _ (list@(n, w)))) less varepsilon _ n" xml:id="S5.Ex49.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex49.m3.8"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex49.m3.8">
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid8"/>
                            <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">g</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex49.m3.8.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex49.m3.8.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex49.m3.1"/>
                                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex49.m3.2"/>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex49.m3.1">n</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex49.m3.2">w</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex49.m3.7"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.5">n</XMTok>
                                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.6">w</XMTok>
                                                </XMWrap>
                                              </XMDual>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>
                                        </XMDual>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                        <XMDual>
                                          <XMApp>
                                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex51.m2.8"/>
                                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex51.m2.9"/>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMWrap>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.8">n</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.9">w</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>
                                        </XMDual>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMDual>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex51.m2.12"/>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMWrap>
                                          <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.12">
                                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                            <XMDual>
                                              <XMApp>
                                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex51.m2.10"/>
                                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex51.m2.11"/>
                                              </XMApp>
                                              <XMWrap>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.10">n</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.11">w</XMTok>
                                              </XMWrap>
                                            </XMDual>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                                        </XMWrap>
                                      </XMDual>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex51.m2.15"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.15">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex51.m2.13"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex51.m2.14"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.13">n</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex51.m2.14">w</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>as soon as <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{n,\,w}" text="x _ (list@(n, w))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m8.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m8.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m8.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m8.2">w</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is non-zero. Since
<Math mode="inline" tex="\overline{\lim}_{\,n\to+\infty}||x_{n,\,w}||=1" text="(overline@(limit)) _ (n to + infinity) * norm@(x _ (list@(n, w))) = 1" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="overline" role="OVERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">lim</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="1.7pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m9.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m9.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m9.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m9.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m9.1">n</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m9.2">w</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and since <Math mode="inline" tex="(\varepsilon_{n})_{n\geq 1}" text="varepsilon _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m10.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is decreasing, this implies that for
any <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta&gt;0" text="delta &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> there exists an integer <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,w}" text="rho _ (list@(n, w))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m13.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m13.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m13.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m13.2">w</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has
a <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q_{n}},\delta)" text="open-interval@(Q _ n, delta)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m14.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m14.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m14.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m14.1">δ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector of norm <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Applying this to <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta=\varepsilon_{0}" text="delta = varepsilon _ 0" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="n_{0}\geq 1" text="n _ 0 &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n_{0},\,w}" text="rho _ (list@(n _ 0, w))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m18.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m18.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m18.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m18.1">w</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has a <Math mode="inline" tex="(Q_{n_{0}},\varepsilon_{0})" text="open-interval@(Q _ n _ 0, varepsilon _ 0)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m19.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m19.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m19.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m19.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector, hence a <Math mode="inline" tex="(Q,\varepsilon_{0})" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon _ 0)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m20.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m20.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m20.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m20.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector.
But
<Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n_{0},\,w}" text="rho _ (list@(n _ 0, w))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m21.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m21.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m21.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m21.1">w</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is weakly mixing, so has no
finite dimensional subrepresentation. This
contradicts assumption (<ref labelref="LABEL:Pro1"/>). So we deduce that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\underline{\lim}_{\,n\to+\infty}\,||\,x_{n,\,c}||=\gamma&gt;0" text="(underline@(limit)) _ (n to + infinity) * norm@(x _ (list@(n, c))) = gamma &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">lim</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="1.7pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m22.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m22.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m22.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m22.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m22.1">n</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m22.2">c</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
The same observation as above, applied to the representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,c}" text="rho _ (list@(n, c))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m23.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m23.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m23.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m23.2">c</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, shows that</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A1.EGx5">
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex52">
            <MathFork>

          <p class="ltx_intertext">for every <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S5.Ex53.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{n,\,c}" text="x _ (list@(n, c))" xml:id="S5.Ex53.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex53.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex53.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex53.m2.1">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex53.m2.2">c</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is non-zero, and thus that</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex54">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle\sup_{g\,\in\,Q_{n}}\Bigl{|}\Bigl{|}\rho_{n,\,c}(g)\dfrac{x_{n,\,%&#10;c}}{||x_{n,\,c}||}-\dfrac{x_{n,\,c}}{||x_{n,\,c}||}\Bigr{|}\Bigr{|}&lt;\dfrac{2{%&#10;\varepsilon_{n}}}{\gamma}" text="(supremum _ (g element-of Q _ n))@(absolute-value@(absolute-value@(rho _ (list@(n, c)) * g * (x _ (list@(n, c)) / norm@(x _ (list@(n, c)))) - x _ (list@(n, c)) / norm@(x _ (list@(n, c)))))) less (2 * varepsilon _ n) / gamma" xml:id="S5.Ex54.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid8"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">g</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex54.m3.14"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S5.Ex54.m3.14">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex54.m3.14.1"/>
                            </XMApp>

          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>for infinitely many integers <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. For these integers, <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,c}" text="rho _ (list@(n, c))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a
compact representation for which <Math mode="inline" tex="{y_{n}}=x_{n,\,c}/||x_{n,\,c}||" text="y _ n = x _ (list@(n, c)) / norm@(x _ (list@(n, c)))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                <XMApp>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m26.1"/>

                      <XMWrap>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m26.5">
