            </XMath>
          </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q_{n}},2\,{\varepsilon_{n}}/\gamma)" text="open-interval@(Q _ n, (2 * varepsilon _ n) / gamma)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m27">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m27.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m27.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m27.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m27.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" rpadding="1.7pt">2</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector of norm <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It has no non-zero
<Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,c}" text="rho _ (list@(n, c))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m30">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m30.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m30.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m30.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m30.2">c</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is compact, it can be
decomposed as a direct sum of finite dimensional representations:
<Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,c}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{l\,\in{L_{n}}}\rho_{n,\,c}^{(l)}" text="rho _ (list@(n, c)) = (direct-sum _ (l element-of L _ n))@((rho _ (list@(n, c))) ^ l)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m31">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m31.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m31.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m31.1">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m31.2">c</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">l</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m31.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m31.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m31.3">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m31.4">c</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m31.5"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m31.5">l</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where
<Math mode="inline" tex="K_{n,\,c}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{l\,\in{L_{n}}}K_{n,\,c}^{(l)}" text="K _ (list@(n, c)) = (direct-sum _ (l element-of L _ n))@((K _ (list@(n, c))) ^ l)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m32">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m32.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m32.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m32.1">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m32.2">c</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">l</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m32.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m32.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m32.3">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m32.4">c</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m32.5"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m32.5">l</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, each space
<Math mode="inline" tex="K_{n,\,c}^{(l)}" text="(K _ (list@(n, c))) ^ l" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m33">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m33.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m33.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m33.1">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m33.2">c</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m33.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m33.3">l</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is finite dimensional, <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,c}^{(l)}" text="(rho _ (list@(n, c))) ^ l" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m34">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m34.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m34.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m34.1">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m34.2">c</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m34.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m34.3">l</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a
representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m35">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="K_{n,\,c}^{(l)}" text="(K _ (list@(n, c))) ^ l" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m36">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m36.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m36.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m36.1">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m36.2">c</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m36.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m36.3">l</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="{L_{n}}" text="L _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m37">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a certain set of
indices. If <Math mode="inline" tex="{L_{n}}" text="L _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m38">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is finite, <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho_{n,\,c}" text="rho _ (list@(n, c))" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m39">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m39.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m39.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m39.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m39.2">c</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is already a
finite dimensional
representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m40">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with a <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q}_{n},2{\varepsilon_{n}}/\gamma)" text="open-interval@(Q _ n, (2 * varepsilon _ n) / gamma)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m41">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m41.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m41.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m41.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m41.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector
and no non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m42">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector. So suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="{L_{n}}" text="L _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m43">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is infinite:
writing <Math mode="inline" tex="{y_{n}}" text="y _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m44">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as
<Math mode="inline" tex="{y_{n}}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{l\,\in{L_{n}}}{y_{n}}^{(l)}" text="y _ n = (direct-sum _ (l element-of L _ n))@((y _ n) ^ l)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m45">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">l</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m45.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m45.1">l</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with respect to the decomposition
<Math mode="inline" tex="K_{n,\,c}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{l\,\in{L_{n}}}K_{n,\,c}^{(l)}" text="K _ (list@(n, c)) = (direct-sum _ (l element-of L _ n))@((K _ (list@(n, c))) ^ l)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m46">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m46.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m46.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m46.1">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m46.2">c</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">l</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m46.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m46.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m46.3">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m46.4">c</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m46.5"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m46.5">l</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have for every finite
subset <Math mode="inline" tex="F" text="F" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m47">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="L_{n}" text="L _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m48">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="g\in Q_{n}" text="g element-of Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m49">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math></p>

                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle&lt;\Bigl{(}\dfrac{2\,{\varepsilon_{n}}}{\gamma}\Bigr{)}^{2}+\sum_{l%&#10;\,\in\,L_{n}\,\setminus\,F}\bigl{|}\bigl{|}\rho_{n,\,c}^{(l)}(g)\,{y_{n}}^{(l)%&#10;}-{y_{n}}^{(l)}\Bigr{|}\Bigr{|}^{2}" text="absent less ((2 * varepsilon _ n) / gamma) ^ 2 + (sum _ (l element-of L _ n set-minus F))@((absolute-value@(absolute-value@((rho _ (list@(n, c))) ^ l * g * (y _ n) ^ l - (y _ n) ^ l))) ^ 2)" xml:id="S5.Ex55.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.Ex55.m2.6"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex55.m2.6">
                                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\bigl{|}\bigl{|}{y_{n}}\bigr{|}\bigr{|}^{2}={\displaystyle}\sum_{l\,\in{L_{n}}%&#10;}\bigl{|}\bigl{|}{y_{n}}^{(l)}\bigr{|}\bigr{|}^{2}=1" text="(absolute-value@(absolute-value@(y _ n))) ^ 2 = (sum _ (l element-of L _ n))@((absolute-value@(absolute-value@((y _ n) ^ l))) ^ 2) = 1" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m50">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m50.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m50.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m50.2.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m50.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">l</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m50.3"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMDual xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m50.3">
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m50.3.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m50.3.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m50.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m50.1">l</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
there exists a finite subset <Math mode="inline" tex="F" text="F" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m51">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="L" text="L" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m52">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that the remainder term
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\displaystyle}\sum_{l\,\in\,L_{n}\,\setminus\,F}4\,\bigl{|}\bigl{|}{y_{n}}^{(%&#10;l)}\bigr{|}\bigr{|}^{2}" text="(sum _ (l element-of L _ n set-minus F))@(4 * (absolute-value@(absolute-value@((y _ n) ^ l))) ^ 2)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m53">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">l</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="set-minus" name="setminus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∖</XMTok>
                      <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER" rpadding="1.7pt">4</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m53.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMDual xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m53.2">
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m53.2.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m53.2.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m53.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m53.1">l</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is less than <Math mode="inline" tex="(\varepsilon_{n}/\gamma)^{2}" text="(varepsilon _ n / gamma) ^ 2" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m54">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m54.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m54.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
It follows that</p>

        <p>Recalling that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex58">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Bigl{|}\Bigl{|}{\mathop{\oplus}}_{l\,\in L_{n}\,\cap\,F}{y_{n}}^{(l)}\Bigr{|}%&#10;\Bigr{|}^{2}=\sum_{l\,\in L_{n}\,\cap\,F}\bigl{|}\bigl{|}{y_{n}}^{(l)}\bigr{|}%&#10;\bigr{|}^{2}&gt;1-\Bigl{(}\dfrac{\varepsilon_{n}}{2\gamma}\Bigr{)}^{2}," text="(absolute-value@(absolute-value@((direct-sum _ (l element-of L _ n intersection F))@((y _ n) ^ l)))) ^ 2 = (sum _ (l element-of L _ n intersection F))@((absolute-value@(absolute-value@((y _ n) ^ l))) ^ 2) &gt; 1 - (varepsilon _ n / (2 * gamma)) ^ 2" xml:id="S5.Ex58.m1">

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex58.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex58.m1.3">
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>we thus obtain that (for <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m55">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> large enough) <Math mode="inline" tex="{\displaystyle}{\mathop{\oplus}}_{l\,\in L_{n}\,\cap\,F}\rho_{n,\,c}^{(l)}" text="(direct-sum _ (l element-of L _ n intersection F))@((rho _ (list@(n, c))) ^ l)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m56">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">l</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="intersection" name="cap" role="ADDOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∩</XMTok>
                      <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m56.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m56.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m56.1">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m56.2">c</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m56.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m56.3">l</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a finite dimensional representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m57">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> having
no non-zero
<Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m58">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector but admitting a <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q_{n}},4\,{\varepsilon_{n}}/\gamma)" text="open-interval@(Q _ n, (4 * varepsilon _ n) / gamma)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m59">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m59.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m59.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m59.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m59.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER" rpadding="1.7pt">4</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector.
Summing things up, we obtain that there exists for infinitely many
integers <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m60">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> a finite dimensional representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{n}" text="sigma _ n" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m61">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m62">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with a
<Math mode="inline" tex="({Q}_{n},4{\varepsilon_{n}}/\gamma)" text="open-interval@(Q _ n, (4 * varepsilon _ n) / gamma)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m63">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m63.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m63.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m63.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m63.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector but no non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m64">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant
vector. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="(\varepsilon_{n})_{n\geq 1}" text="varepsilon _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m65">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS2.p3.m65.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS2.p3.m65.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> decreases to zero,
Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:Lemma_6.1"/> follows immediately.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:Section_5.3" xml:id="S5.SS3">
      <tags>
        <tag>5.3</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection 5.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">5.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§5.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">5.3</tag>Kazhdan property for ampliations of finite dimensional
irreducible representations</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS3.p1">
        <p>In order to complete the proof of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_0"/>, we need to
consider
separately two cases, depending on whether or not infinitely many of the
non-Kazhdan sets <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS3.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> satisfy a weak form of the Kazhdan property, which we
call the <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">Kazhdan property for ampliations of
finite dimensional irreducible
representations.</text> Let us first introduce the following definition.
<!--  %**** String Line 1300 **** --></p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_definition" inlist="thm theorem:definition" labels="LABEL:Definition_6.1.1" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2">
        <tags>
          <tag>Definition 5.2</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">5.2</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">5.2</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Definition 5.2</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Definition 5.2</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1">
          <p class="ltx_emph"><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathscr{C}" text="C" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="script upright" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a class of representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> on a Hilbert
space.
We say that a subset <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is a </text>Kazhdan set for the class
<Math mode="inline" tex="\mathscr{C}" text="C" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="script" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math><text font="italic"> if there exists a positive constant <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon^{\prime}" text="varepsilon ^ prime" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> such that the following holds true: if <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is a
representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> belonging to <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathscr{C}" text="C" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="script upright" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> which admits a
<Math mode="inline" tex="({Q},\varepsilon^{\prime})" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon ^ prime)" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m10.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m10.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m10.1">Q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m10.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-invariant vector, then <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> has a
non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem2.p1.m12">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>-invariant vector.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS3.p2">
        <p>Kazhdan’s Property (T) for particular classes of representations is a much studied topic.
For instance Property (<Math mode="inline" tex="\tau" text="tau" xml:id="S5.SS3.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) for discrete groups
(see, among other references <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Kass2" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> or <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Lub" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>) is Property (T)
for the class of representations which factor through a finite index subgroup.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS3.p3">
        <p>We will consider here the class <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathscr{C}_{0}" text="C _ 0" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="script" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> consisting of all
ampliations of finite dimensional irreducible representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
These are the
representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of the form</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex59">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\pi_{I}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{i\,\in\,I}\pi_{i}," text="pi _ I = (direct-sum _ (i element-of I))@(pi _ i)" xml:id="S5.Ex59.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex59.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex59.m1.1">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a finite or infinite set of indices, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{i}=\pi" text="pi _ i = pi" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for
every <Math mode="inline" tex="i\in I" text="i element-of I" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
with <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> an irreducible representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on a
finite dimensional space <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{I}" text="pi _ I" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is thus a
representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{I}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{i\,\in\,I}H_{i}" text="H _ I = (direct-sum _ (i element-of I))@(H _ i)" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, with
<!--  %**** String Line 1325 **** --><Math mode="inline" tex="H_{i}=H" text="H _ i = H" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
for every <Math mode="inline" tex="i\in I" text="i element-of I" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. When no confusion arises, we simply write
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{I}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{i\,\in\,I}\pi" text="pi _ I = (direct-sum _ (i element-of I))@(pi)" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{I}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{i\,\in\,I}H" text="H _ I = (direct-sum _ (i element-of I))@(H)" xml:id="S5.SS3.p3.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_fact" inlist="thm theorem:fact" labels="LABEL:Fact_6.1.2" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem3">
        <tags>
          <tag>Fact 5.3</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">5.3</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">5.3</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Fact 5.3</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Fact 5.3</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem3.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem3.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a subset of a topological group <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem3.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. The following assertions are equivalent:</text></p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S5.Thmtheorem3.p2">
          <itemize xml:id="S5.I2">

              <para xml:id="S5.I2.ix3.p1">
                <p><text font="italic">let </text><Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.I2.ix3.p1.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>

                  </Math><text font="italic"> be a finite dimensional irreducible

                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>

                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic">, and let
</text><Math mode="inline" tex="(x_{i})_{i\,\in\,I}" text="x _ i _ (i element-of I)" xml:id="S5.I2.ix3.p1.m4">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>

                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic"> be a finite family of vectors of </text><Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S5.I2.ix3.p1.m5">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math><text font="italic">. If</text></p>
                <equation xml:id="S5.Ex61">
                  <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{g\,\in\,{Q}}\Bigl{(}{\displaystyle}\sum_{i\,\in\,I}\,||\pi(g)x_{i}-x_{i}%&#10;||^{2}\Bigr{)}^{1/2}&lt;{\varepsilon^{\prime}}\,\Bigl{(}{\displaystyle}\sum_{i\,%&#10;\in\,I}||x_{i}||^{2}\Bigr{)}^{1/2}," text="(supremum _ (g element-of Q))@(((sum _ (i element-of I))@((norm@(pi * g * x _ i - x _ i)) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)) less varepsilon ^ prime * ((sum _ (i element-of I))@((norm@(x _ i)) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)" xml:id="S5.Ex61.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex61.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex61.m1.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid4"/>
                                <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">g</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>

        <p>So property
(<Math mode="inline" tex="\beta" text="beta" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) is equivalent to the fact that if
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a finite dimensional irreducible representation having an
ampliation with a
<Math mode="inline" tex="({Q},\varepsilon^{\prime})" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon ^ prime)" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS3.p4.m11.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS3.p4.m11.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m11.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m11.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi=\mathbbm{1}_{G}" text="pi = 1 _ G" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is assumed to be irreducible, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has a non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector
if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi=\mathbbm{1}_{G}" text="pi = 1 _ G" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Thus properties
(<Math mode="inline" tex="\alpha" text="alpha" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="alpha" role="UNKNOWN">α</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) and (<Math mode="inline" tex="\beta" text="beta" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) are equivalent.
That (<Math mode="inline" tex="\beta" text="beta" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) implies (<Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma" text="gamma" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) is obvious. Suppose now that (<Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma" text="gamma" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) holds true.
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a finite dimensional irreducible representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
<!--  %**** String Line 1375 **** -->and let <Math mode="inline" tex="(x_{i})_{i\,\in\,I}" text="x _ i _ (i element-of I)" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS3.p4.m25.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m25.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be an infinite family of vectors of <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that</p>

        <p>There exists a <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta&gt;0" text="delta &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m27">

        <p>For any finite subset <Math mode="inline" tex="F" text="F" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="I" text="I" xml:id="S5.SS3.p4.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A1.EGx7">
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex65">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle\sup_{g\,\in\,{Q}}{\displaystyle}\sum_{i\,\in\,F}\,||\pi(g)x_{i}-%&#10;x_{i}||^{2}&lt;\varepsilon^{\prime\,2}{\displaystyle}\sum_{i\,\in\,F}||x_{i}||^{2%&#10;}+\varepsilon^{\prime\,2}\!\!{\displaystyle}\sum_{i\,\in\,I\setminus F}||x_{i}%&#10;||^{2}." text="(supremum _ (g element-of Q))@((sum _ (i element-of F))@((norm@(pi * g * x _ i - x _ i)) ^ 2)) less varepsilon ^ (list@(prime1, 2)) * (sum _ (i element-of F))@((norm@(x _ i)) ^ 2) + varepsilon ^ (list@(prime1, 2)) * (sum _ (i element-of I set-minus F))@((norm@(x _ i)) ^ 2)" xml:id="S5.Ex65.m3">

                                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>

                                        <XMRef idref="S5.Ex65.m3.5"/>

                                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
