        </equation>
        <p>Recall that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{j,\,n}" text="pi _ (list@(j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m15.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m15.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m15.1">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m15.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an irreducible representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="K_{j,\,n}" text="K _ (list@(j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m17.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m17.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m17.1">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m17.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, that the representations <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{j,\,n}" text="pi _ (list@(j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m18.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m18.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m18.1">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m18.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for distinct <Math mode="inline" tex="j" text="j" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are mutually inequivalent, and that
<Math mode="inline" tex="U_{i,\,j,\,n}" text="U _ (list@(i, j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m20.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m20.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m20.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m20.1">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m20.2">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m20.3">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is for each <Math mode="inline" tex="j\in J_{n}" text="j element-of J _ n" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="i\in I_{j,n}" text="i element-of I _ (list@(j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m22.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m22.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m22.1">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m22.2">n</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> a unitary operator from <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{i,\,j,\,n}" text="H _ (list@(i, j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m23.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m23.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m23.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m23.1">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m23.2">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m23.3">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> into <Math mode="inline" tex="K_{j,\,n}" text="K _ (list@(j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">K</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m24.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m24.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m24.1">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m24.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We also decompose <Math mode="inline" tex="{a_{n}}\in H_{n}" text="a _ n element-of H _ n" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="{a_{n}}={\mathop{\oplus}}\limits_{j\,\in J_{n}}\,\bigl{(}\,\,{\mathop{\oplus}}%&#10;\limits_{i\,\in I_{j,\,n}}a_{i,\,j,\,n}\,\bigr{)}" text="a _ n = (direct-sum _ (j element-of J _ n))@((direct-sum _ (i element-of I _ (list@(j, n))))@(a _ (list@(i, j, n))))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m26.6"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" rpadding="3.3pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m26.6">
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="mid">⊕</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m26.1"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m26.2"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m26.1">j</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m26.2">n</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m26.3"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m26.4"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m26.5"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m26.3">i</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m26.4">j</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m26.5">n</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We have</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex74">
          <Math mode="display" tex="||a_{n}||=\sum_{j\,\in J_{n}}\,\,\sum_{i\,\in I_{j,\,n}}||a_{i,\,j,\,n}||^{2}=1" text="norm@(a _ n) = (sum _ (j element-of J _ n))@((sum _ (i element-of I _ (list@(j, n))))@((norm@(a _ (list@(i, j, n)))) ^ 2)) = 1" xml:id="S5.Ex74.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>

        </equation>
        <p>and</p>

                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=\sum_{j\,\in J_{n}}\,\,\sum_{i\,\in I_{j,\,n}}||\pi_{\ijna}{}_{i%&#10;,\,j,\,n}-a_{i,\,j,\,n}||^{2}" xml:id="S5.Ex75.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                      <XMApp rpadding="3.3pt" scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid8"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid8"/>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

        <p>for every <Math mode="inline" tex="g\in G" text="g element-of G" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m27">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
In order to simplify the notation, we set <Math mode="inline" tex="b_{i,\,j,\,n}=U_{\ijna}{}_{i,\,j,\,n}" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>

              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\ijna</ERROR>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUBSCRIPT" scriptpos="2">
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m28.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m28.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m28.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m28.4">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m28.5">j</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for
every <Math mode="inline" tex="j\in J_{n}" text="j element-of J _ n" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="i\in I_{j,\,n}" text="i element-of I _ (list@(j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m30">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m30.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m30.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m30.1">j</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m30.2">n</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It follows from (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq7"/>)
that we
have for every <Math mode="inline" tex="j\in J_{n}" text="j element-of J _ n" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m31">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:Eq8" xml:id="S5.E11">
          <tags>
            <tag>(11)</tag>
            <tag role="autoref">Equation 11</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">11</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{g\,\in\,{Q_{n}}}\Bigl{(}\sum_{i\,\in I_{j,\,n}}||\pi_{j,\,n}(g)\,b_{i,\,%&#10;j,\,n}-b_{i,\,j,\,n}||^{2}\Bigr{)}^{1/2}&lt;{\varepsilon_{n}}." text="(supremum _ (g element-of Q _ n))@(((sum _ (i element-of I _ (list@(j, n))))@((norm@(pi _ (list@(j, n)) * g * b _ (list@(i, j, n)) - b _ (list@(i, j, n)))) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)) less varepsilon _ n" xml:id="S5.E11.m1">

        <p>Let us stress here that each vector <Math mode="inline" tex="b_{i,\,j,\,n}" text="b _ (list@(i, j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m32">
            <XMath>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="j\in J_{n}" text="j element-of J _ n" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m33">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="i\in I_{j,\,n}" text="i element-of I _ (list@(j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m34">
            <XMath>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, belongs to <Math mode="inline" tex="K_{j,\,n}" text="K _ (list@(j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m35">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                <XMDual>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It is at this point that we use the fact that <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m36">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
is a Kazhdan set for ampliations of finite dimensional irreducible
representations for every <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq n_{0}" text="n &gt;= n _ 0" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m37">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, with associated constant <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon^{\prime}_{0}" text="(varepsilon ^ prime) _ 0" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m38">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>: since <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{j,\,n}" text="pi _ (list@(j, n))" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m39">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m39.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m39.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m39.1">j</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m39.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is irreducible, and different from <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbbm{1}_{G}" text="1 _ G" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m40">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (as <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{n}" text="pi _ n" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m41">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
has no non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m42">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector), it follows from Fact <ref labelref="LABEL:Fact_6.1.2"/> and (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq8"/>) that</p>

<!--  %**** String Line 1550 **** -->        <p>Remembering that (with the notation of Section <ref labelref="LABEL:Section_4.3"/>) <Math mode="inline" tex="\smash{{\displaystyle}\sum_{i\,\in I_{j,\,n}}\!\!||\,b_{i,\,j,\,n}||^{2}=||{%&#10;\widetilde{{b}}}_{j,\,n}||^{2}=||{\widetilde{{a}}}_{j,\,n}||^{2}}" text="(sum _ (i element-of I _ (list@(j, n))))@((norm@(b _ (list@(i, j, n)))) ^ 2) = (norm@((widetilde@(b)) _ (list@(j, n)))) ^ 2 = (norm@((widetilde@(a)) _ (list@(j, n)))) ^ 2" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m43">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp rpadding="-3.3pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m43.1"/>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>

                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m43.12">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>

                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m43.8">j</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m43.9">n</XMTok>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>

                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
we thus get that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex77">
          <Math mode="display" tex="||{\widetilde{{a}}}_{j,\,n}||&lt;\dfrac{\varepsilon_{n}}{\varepsilon^{\prime}_{0}}" text="norm@((widetilde@(a)) _ (list@(j, n))) less varepsilon _ n / (varepsilon ^ prime) _ 0" xml:id="S5.Ex77.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.Ex77.m1.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex77.m1.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>

                          <XMRef idref="S5.Ex77.m1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex77.m1.1">j</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>for every <Math mode="inline" tex="j\in J_{n}" text="j element-of J _ n" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m44">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Using Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:Corollary_5.7"/>, the fact that <Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{j\,\in J_{n}}||\,{\widetilde{{a}}}_{j,\,n}||^{2}=||{a_{n}}||^{2}=1" text="(sum _ (j element-of J _ n))@((norm@((widetilde@(a)) _ (list@(j, n)))) ^ 2) = (norm@(a _ n)) ^ 2 = 1" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m45">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m45.3"/>

                      <XMWrap>

            </XMath>
          </Math>, and
assumption (ii) on the sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="({\varepsilon_{n}})_{n\geq 1}" text="varepsilon _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m46">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m46.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m46.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we obtain that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S5.Ex78">
          <Math mode="display" tex="m(\,|{{\langle{\pi_{n}(\,\centerdot\,){a_{n}}},{a_{n}}\rangle}}|^{2})\leq\sum_%&#10;{j\,\in J_{n}}||\,{\widetilde{{a}}}_{j,\,n}||^{4}\leq\max_{j\,\in J_{n}}||\,{%&#10;\widetilde{{a}}}_{j,\,n}||^{2}\,.\,\sum_{j\,\in J_{n}}||\,{\widetilde{{a}}}_{j%&#10;,\,n}||^{2}&lt;\Bigl{(}\dfrac{\varepsilon_{n}}{\varepsilon^{\prime}_{0}}\Bigr{)}^%&#10;{2}&lt;4^{-n}." text="formulae@(m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi _ n * centerdot * a _ n, a _ n))) ^ 2 less= (sum _ (j element-of J _ n))@((norm@((widetilde@(a)) _ (list@(j, n)))) ^ 4) less= maximum _ (j element-of J _ n) * (norm@((widetilde@(a)) _ (list@(j, n)))) ^ 2, (sum _ (j element-of J _ n))@((norm@((widetilde@(a)) _ (list@(j, n)))) ^ 2) less (varepsilon _ n / (varepsilon ^ prime) _ 0) ^ 2 less 4 ^ (- n))" xml:id="S5.Ex78.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>

                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>

                                <XMDual>

                                            <XMWrap>

                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                          <XMApp>
                                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>

                                <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PERIOD" rpadding="1.7pt">.</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex78.m1.9.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                            <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="mid">∑</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">j</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">J</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S5.Ex78.m1.9.2.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex78.m1.9.2.1">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex78.m1.5"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S5.Ex78.m1.6"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex78.m1.5">j</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex78.m1.6">n</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex78.m1.8"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex78.m1.8">
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>It follows that
<Math mode="inline" tex="m(\,|{{\langle{\pi_{n}(\,\centerdot\,){a_{n}}},{a_{n}}\rangle}}|^{2})" text="m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi _ n * centerdot * a _ n, a _ n))) ^ 2" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m47">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m47.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m47.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m47.2.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m47.2.1">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m47.2.1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m47.2.1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m47.2.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS4.p7.m47.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok name="centerdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m47.1">∙</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m47.2.1.2">
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> tends to zero as <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m48">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> tends to infinity.
So <Math mode="inline" tex="\boldsymbol{\pi}" text="pi" xml:id="S5.SS4.p7.m49">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is weakly mixing by
Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_4.3"/>, and
Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_6.2"/> is proved.
<!--  %**** String Line 1575 **** --></p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:Section_6.6" xml:id="S5.SS5">
      <tags>
        <tag>5.5</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection 5.5</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">5.5</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§5.5</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">5.5</tag>Case 2</title>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS5.p1">
        <p>Suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is
never a Kazhdan set for ampliations of finite dimensional irreducible
representations. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon&gt;0" text="varepsilon &gt; 0" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
be an arbitrary positive number. We fix a sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="({\varepsilon_{n}})_{n\geq 1}" text="varepsilon _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.p1.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of
positive numbers decreasing to zero so fast that the following properties
hold true:</p>
        <enumerate xml:id="S5.I5">
          <item xml:id="S5.I5.ix18">
            <tags>
              <tag>(i)</tag>
              <tag role="autoref">item </tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item (i)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S5.I5.ix18.p1">
              <p><Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{n\geq 1}{\varepsilon_{n}}&lt;\varepsilon^{2}/2" text="(sum _ (n &gt;= 1))@(varepsilon _ n) less varepsilon ^ 2 / 2" xml:id="S5.I5.ix18.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>;</p>
            </para>
          </item>
          <item xml:id="S5.I5.ix19">
            <tags>
              <tag>(ii)</tag>
              <tag role="autoref">item </tag>
              <tag role="typerefnum">item (ii)</tag>
            </tags>
            <para xml:id="S5.I5.ix19.p1">
              <p>for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.I5.ix19.p1.m1">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\frac{1}{n+1}\sum_{j=n}^{2n}\varepsilon_{j}^{2}&lt;{\varepsilon_{n}}^{2}" text="(1 / (n + 1)) * ((sum _ (j = n)) ^ (2 * n))@((varepsilon _ j) ^ 2) less (varepsilon _ n) ^ 2" xml:id="S5.I5.ix19.p1.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMApp>

                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>

                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>.</p>
            </para>
          </item>
        </enumerate>
        <p>Our additional assumption on the sets <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implies by Fact <ref labelref="LABEL:Fact_6.1.2"/> that there exists, for every
<Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, an irreducible representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{n}" text="pi _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on a
finite dimensional Hilbert space <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, without non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant
vectors, and a finite family <Math mode="inline" tex="(a_{i,\,n})_{i\,\in I_{n}}" text="a _ (list@(i, n)) _ (i element-of I _ n)" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.p1.m10.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m10.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.p1.m10.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.p1.m10.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m10.1">i</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m10.2">n</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">i</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of vectors
of
<Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (with <Math mode="inline" tex="I_{n}\subseteq{\mathbb{N}}" text="I _ n subset-of-or-equals N" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="subset-of-or-equals" name="subseteq" role="RELOP">⊆</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">I</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>) such that</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:eq++" xml:id="S5.E12">
          <tags>
            <tag>(12)</tag>
            <tag role="autoref">Equation 12</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">12</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Bigl{(}\sum_{i\,\in I_{n}}||\,a_{i,\,n}||^{2}\Bigr{)}^{1/2}\!\!\!\!=1\quad%&#10;\textrm{and}\quad\sup_{g\,\in\,{Q_{n}}}\Bigl{(}\sum_{i\,\in I_{n}}||\pi_{n}(g)%&#10;\,a_{i,\,n}-a_{i,\,n}||^{2}\Bigr{)}^{1/2}\!\!\!&lt;{\varepsilon_{n}}." text="formulae@(((sum _ (i element-of I _ n))@((norm@(a _ (list@(i, n)))) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2) = list@(1, [and]), (supremum _ (g element-of Q _ n))@(((sum _ (i element-of I _ n))@((norm@(pi _ n * g * a _ (list@(i, n)) - a _ (list@(i, n)))) ^ 2)) ^ (1 / 2)) less varepsilon _ n)" xml:id="S5.E12.m1">

        <p>this means that <Math mode="inline" tex="||{\widetilde{{a}}}_{n}||=1" text="norm@((widetilde@(a)) _ n) = 1" xml:id="S5.SS5.p1.m13">

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S5.SS5.p2">
        <p>Now we again have to consider separately two cases.</p>
      </para>
      <subsubsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:Section_6.6.1" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1">
        <tags>
          <tag>5.5.1</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">subsubsection 5.5.1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">5.5.1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">§5.5.1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title><tag close=" ">5.5.1</tag>Case 2.a</title>
        <para xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1">
          <p>There exists an infinite
subset <Math mode="inline" tex="D" text="D" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{N}}" text="N" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> such that
whenever <Math mode="inline" tex="k" text="k" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="l" text="l" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are two distinct elements of <Math mode="inline" tex="D" text="D" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{k}" text="pi _ k" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{l}" text="pi _ l" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">l</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> are not equivalent. Replacing the sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi_{n})_{n\geq 1}" text="pi _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m8.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m8.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi_{n})_{n\in D}" text="pi _ n _ (n element-of D)" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m9.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">D</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we can
suppose without loss of generality
that for every distinct integers <Math mode="inline" tex="m" text="m" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, with <Math mode="inline" tex="m,n\geq 1" text="list@(m, n) &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m12">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m12.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m12.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m12.1">m</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m12.2">n</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{m}" text="pi _ m" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m13">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{n}" text="pi _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p1.m14">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
are not equivalent.</p>
        </para>
        <para xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2">
          <p>Consider for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> the representation</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex80">
            <Math mode="display" tex="\rho_{n}={\widetilde{{\pi}}}_{n}{\mathop{\oplus}}\cdots{\mathop{\oplus}}{%&#10;\widetilde{{\pi}}}_{2n}\quad\textrm{of}\ G\ \textrm{on}\quad{\mathscr{H}}_{n}=%&#10;{\widetilde{{H}}}_{n}{\mathop{\oplus}}\cdots{\mathop{\oplus}}{\widetilde{{H}}}%&#10;_{2n}," text="formulae@(rho _ n = list@((widetilde@(pi)) _ n * direct-sum@(cdots * direct-sum@((widetilde@(pi)) _ (2 * n))), [of] * G * [on]), H _ n = (widetilde@(H)) _ n * direct-sum@(cdots * direct-sum@((widetilde@(H)) _ (2 * n))))" xml:id="S5.Ex80.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex80.m1.1"/>

                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>

                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>and the vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{a_{n}}=\dfrac{1}{\sqrt{n+1}}\bigl{(}\,{\widetilde{{a}}}_{n}{\mathop{\oplus}}%&#10;\cdots{\mathop{\oplus}}{\widetilde{{a}}}_{2n}\bigr{)}" text="a _ n = (1 / square-root@(n + 1)) * (widetilde@(a)) _ n * direct-sum@(cdots * direct-sum@((widetilde@(a)) _ (2 * n)))" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="square-root"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m2.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="cdots" role="ID">⋯</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="BIGOP" scriptpos="post">⊕</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok name="widetilde" role="OVERACCENT">~</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathscr{H}}_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="script" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, which satisfies <Math mode="inline" tex="||{a_{n}}||=1" text="norm@(a _ n) = 1" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m4.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m4.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>. For every <Math mode="inline" tex="g\in{Q_{n}}" text="g element-of Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> we
have, since <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q_{n}}" text="Q _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is contained in <Math mode="inline" tex="Q_{j}" text="Q _ j" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="j\geq n" text="j &gt;= n" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">j</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,</p>
          <equation xml:id="S5.Ex81">
            <Math mode="display" tex="||\rho_{n}(g){a_{n}}-{a_{n}}||^{2}=\dfrac{1}{n+1}\sum_{j=n}^{2n}\ \bigl{|}%&#10;\bigl{|}{\widetilde{{\pi}}}_{j}(g){\widetilde{{a}}}_{j}-{\widetilde{{a}}}_{j}%&#10;\bigr{|}\bigr{|}^{2}&lt;\dfrac{1}{n+1}\sum_{j=n}^{2n}\varepsilon_{j}^{2}." text="(norm@(rho _ n * g * a _ n - a _ n)) ^ 2 = (1 / (n + 1)) * ((sum _ (j = n)) ^ (2 * n))@((absolute-value@(absolute-value@((widetilde@(pi)) _ j * g * (widetilde@(a)) _ j - (widetilde@(a)) _ j))) ^ 2) less (1 / (n + 1)) * ((sum _ (j = n)) ^ (2 * n))@((varepsilon _ j) ^ 2)" xml:id="S5.Ex81.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex81.m1.3"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex81.m1.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S5.Ex81.m1.3.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S5.Ex81.m1.3.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S5.Ex81.m1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S5.Ex81.m1.1">g</XMTok>

                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>

                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>

            </Math>
          </equation>
          <p>By assumption
(ii) on the sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="({\varepsilon_{n}})_{n\geq 1}" text="varepsilon _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m9.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m9.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, we obtain that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sup_{g\,\in\,{Q_{n}}}||\rho_{n}(g){a_{n}}-{a_{n}}||&lt;{\varepsilon_{n}}" text="(supremum _ (g element-of Q _ n))@(norm@(rho _ n * g * a _ n - a _ n)) less varepsilon _ n" xml:id="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m10">

                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S5.SS5.SSS1.p2.m10.2"/>
