        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Example 7.8</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="p" text="p" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a non-constant real polynomial, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}=\{p(k)\,;\,k\geq 0\}" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m2.1">k</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m2.2">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="(-\delta,\delta)\cup{Q}" text="open-interval@(- delta, delta) union Q" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m3.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m3.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m3.2">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="delta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m3.1">δ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is a Kazhdan subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> for any <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta&gt;0" text="delta &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem8.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>

                  <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>

              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">T</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">r</XMTok>
                </XMApp>

          </Math> is irrational. This condition excludes only countably many values of <Math mode="inline" tex="t" text="t" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m9">

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m10.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m10.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m10.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m10.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every integer <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Applying Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_+"/>, we obtain that there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="(-n,n)\cup{Q}" text="open-interval@(- n, n) union Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m13.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m13.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m13.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m13.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon&gt;0" text="varepsilon &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a Kazhdan constant for this set. Fix <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta&gt;0" text="delta &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. In order to prove that <Math mode="inline" tex="(-\delta,\delta)\cup{Q}" text="open-interval@(- delta, delta) union Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m17.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m17.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m17.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m17.1">δ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we use Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_A"/>: let <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma" text="gamma" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a positive number which will be fixed later on, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a probability measure on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup_{t\in(-\delta,\delta)\cup{Q}}\,\bigl{|}\widehat{\sigma}(t)-1\bigr{|}&lt;\gamma" text="(supremum _ (t element-of open-interval@(- delta, delta) union Q))@(absolute-value@(widehat@(sigma) * t - 1)) less gamma" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
For any <Math mode="inline" tex="a\in{\mathbb{N}}" text="a element-of N" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

            <XMath>

            </XMath>
          </Math>,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex100">
          <Math mode="display" tex="2(1-\Re e\,\widehat{\sigma}(at))=\int_{\mathbb{R}}\bigl{|}e^{iatx}-1\bigr{|}^{%&#10;2}d\sigma(x)\leq a^{2}\int_{\mathbb{R}}\bigl{|}e^{itx}-1\bigr{|}^{2}d\sigma(x)%&#10;\leq 2a^{2}\Re e\,(1-\widehat{\sigma}(t))" text="2 * (1 - real-part@(e * widehat@(sigma)) * a * t) = (integral _ R)@((absolute-value@(e ^ (i * a * t * x) - 1)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(sigma) * x) less= a ^ 2 * (integral _ R)@((absolute-value@(e ^ (i * t * x) - 1)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(sigma) * x) less= 2 * a ^ 2 * real-part@(e) * (1 - widehat@(sigma) * t)" xml:id="S7.Ex100.m1">

        <p>so that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\displaystyle}\sup_{t\in(\delta,\delta)}\,(1-\Re e\,\widehat{\sigma}(at))&lt;a^{%&#10;2}\gamma" text="(supremum _ (t element-of open-interval@(delta, delta)))@(1 - real-part@(e * widehat@(sigma)) * a * t) less a ^ 2 * gamma" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m25.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m25.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m25.1">δ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m25.2">δ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m25.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m25.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="real-part" name="Re" role="OPFUNCTION">ℜ</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">e</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m25.3.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m25.3.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If we choose <Math mode="inline" tex="a&gt;n/\delta" text="a &gt; n / delta" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we obtain that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex101">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{t\in(-n,n)}\,\bigl{|}1-\widehat{\sigma}(t)\bigr{|}^{2}\leq 2\sup_{t\in(-%&#10;n,n)}\,\bigl{(}1-\Re e\,\widehat{\sigma}(t)\bigr{)}&lt;2a^{2}\gamma." text="(supremum _ (t element-of open-interval@(- n, n)))@((absolute-value@(1 - widehat@(sigma) * t)) ^ 2) less= 2 * (supremum _ (t element-of open-interval@(- n, n)))@(1 - real-part@(e * widehat@(sigma)) * t) less 2 * a ^ 2 * gamma" xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex101.m1.7"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1.7">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex101.m1.2"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex101.m1.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1.2">
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1.1">n</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex101.m1.7.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1.7.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S7.Ex101.m1.5"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1.5">t</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex101.m1.4"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex101.m1.3"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1.4">
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1.3">n</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex101.m1.7.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1.7.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="real-part" name="Re" role="OPFUNCTION">ℜ</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">e</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S7.Ex101.m1.6"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex101.m1.6">t</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>So if <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma" text="gamma" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m27">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is chosen so small that <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma&lt;\min(\varepsilon,\varepsilon^{2}/(2a^{2}))" text="gamma less minimum@(varepsilon, varepsilon ^ 2 / (2 * a ^ 2))" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m28.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m28.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m28.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="minimum" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m28.1">min</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m28.2">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m28.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m28.3.1"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m28.3.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we obtain that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex102">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{t\in(-n,n)\cup{Q}}\,\bigl{|}1-\widehat{\sigma}(t)\bigr{|}&lt;\varepsilon," text="(supremum _ (t element-of open-interval@(- n, n) union Q))@(absolute-value@(1 - widehat@(sigma) * t)) less varepsilon" xml:id="S7.Ex102.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex102.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex102.m1.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex102.m1.2"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex102.m1.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex102.m1.2">
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex102.m1.1">n</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex102.m1.4.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex102.m1.4.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex102.m1.3"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex102.m1.3">t</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and since <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon" text="varepsilon" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan constant for <Math mode="inline" tex="(-n,n)\cup{Q}" text="open-interval@(- n, n) union Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m30">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m30.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m30.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m30.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m30.1">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(\{0\})&gt;0" text="sigma * set@(0) &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m31">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m31.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m31.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m31.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m31.1">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence <Math mode="inline" tex="\gamma" text="gamma" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m32">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="gamma" role="UNKNOWN">γ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan constant for <Math mode="inline" tex="(-\delta,\delta)\cup{Q}" text="open-interval@(- delta, delta) union Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m33">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m33.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p11.m33.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m33.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p11.m33.1">δ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_remark" inlist="thm theorem:remark" labels="LABEL:Remark_8.6" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9">
        <tags>
          <tag>Remark 7.9</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">7.9</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">7.9</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 7.9</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 7.9</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">It is necessary to add a small interval to the set <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> in order to turn it into a Kazhdan subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, even when <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> generates a dense subgroup of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. Indeed, consider the polynomial <Math mode="inline" tex="p(x)=x+\sqrt{2}" text="p * x = x + square-root@(2)" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m5">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="square-root"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. The set <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}=\{k+\sqrt{2}\,;\,k\geq 0\}" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m6">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                      <XMTok meaning="square-root"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m6.1">k</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is not a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m7">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>: for any <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon&gt;0" text="varepsilon &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m8">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, let <Math mode="inline" tex="b\in{\mathbb{N}}" text="b element-of N" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m9">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be such that <Math mode="inline" tex="|e^{2i\pi b\sqrt{2}}-1|&lt;\varepsilon" text="absolute-value@(e ^ (2 * i * pi * b * square-root@(2)) - 1) less varepsilon" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m10">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m10.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m10.1">
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="square-root"/>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>. The measure
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m11">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> defined as the Dirac mass at the point <Math mode="inline" tex="{2\pi b}" text="2 * pi * b" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m12">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> satisfies <Math mode="inline" tex="\sup_{k\geq 0}\,|\widehat{\sigma}(k+\sqrt{2})-1|&lt;\varepsilon" text="(supremum _ (k &gt;= 0))@(absolute-value@(widehat@(sigma) * (k + square-root@(2)) - 1)) less varepsilon" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m13">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">sup</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m13.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m13.1">
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok font="upright" name="widehat" role="OVERACCENT">^</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m13.1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m13.1.1">
                                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">k</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="square-root"/>
                                      <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>, so that, by Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_A"/>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m14">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is not a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem9.p1.m15">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math>.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p12">
        <p>We finish this section by exhibiting a link between Kazhdan subsets of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}" text="Z ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and
Kazhdan subsets of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="d\geq 1" text="d &gt;= 1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}" text="Z ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Seen as a subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is never a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. But as a consequence of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_0"/>, we see that <Math mode="inline" tex="Q" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> becomes a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p12.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> if we add a small perturbation to it.</p>
      </para>

      <ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p13">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon&gt;0" text="varepsilon &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a Kazhdan constant for <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, seen as a subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}" text="Z ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Consider a unitary representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on a separable Hilbert space <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which admits a <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q},\varepsilon^{2}/2)" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon ^ 2 / 2)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p13.m7.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p13.m7.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m7.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m7.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in H" text="x element-of H" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We are going to show that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> admits a finite dimensional subrepresentation, which by Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_2"/> will imply that <Math mode="inline" tex="W_{n}\cup{Q}" text="W _ n union Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p13.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS1.p14">
        <p>Without loss of generality we can suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a direct integral on a Borel space <Math mode="inline" tex="Z" text="Z" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, with respect to a finite measure <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="Z" text="Z" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, of a family <Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi_{z})_{z\in{\mathbb{Z}}}" text="pi _ z _ (z element-of Z)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m5.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m5.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of irreducible representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. So <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(Z,\mu)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(Z, mu)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m9.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m9.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m9.1">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m9.2">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We write elements <Math mode="inline" tex="f" text="f" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(Z,\mu)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(Z, mu)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m11.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m11.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m11.1">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m11.2">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="f=(f_{z})_{z\in Z}" text="f = f _ z _ (z element-of Z)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m12.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
We suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="||x||=1" text="norm@(x) = 1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m13.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m13.1">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>; our hypothesis implies that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex103">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{t}}\in{Q}}\,\bigl{|}1-{{\langle{\pi({\mskip 1.%&#10;5mu \boldsymbol{t}})x},{x}\rangle}}\bigr{|}&lt;\dfrac{\varepsilon^{2}}{2}\cdot" xml:id="S7.Ex103.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex103.m1.1">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex103.m1.2">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Each representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{z}" text="pi _ z" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> acts on vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{t}}=(t_{1},\dots,t_{d})" text="t = vector@(t _ 1, dots, t _ d)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m15.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m15.1">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m15.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{z}({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{t}})=\exp(2i\pi{{\langle{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{t}},{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\theta}}_{z}}\rangle}})" text="pi _ z * t = exponential@(2 * i * pi * list@(t, theta _ z))" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                          <XMApp>

                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m17.4.1">
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>

                            </XMApp>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\theta}}_{z}=(\theta_{1,z},\dots,\theta_{d,z})" text="theta _ z = vector@(theta _ (list@(1, z)), dots, theta _ (list@(d, z)))" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m18.6"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m18.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m18.7"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m18.6">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m18.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m18.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m18.1">1</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m18.2">z</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m18.5">…</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m18.7">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="theta" role="UNKNOWN">θ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m18.3"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m18.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m18.3">d</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m18.4">z</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Hence</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex104">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{t}}\in{Q}}\,\Bigl{|}1-\int_{Z}e^{2i\pi{{%&#10;\langle{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{t}},{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\theta}}_{z}}%&#10;\rangle}}}|x_{z}|^{2}d\mu(z)\Bigr{|}&lt;\dfrac{\varepsilon^{2}}{2}\cdot" xml:id="S7.Ex104.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt" scriptpos="mid">
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>

                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex104.m1.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.Ex104.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="langle" role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex104.m1.1">t</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex104.m1.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
