                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex104.m1.3">z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Consider now the representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}" text="Z ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(Z,\mu)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(Z, mu)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m22.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m22.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m22.1">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m22.2">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> defined by
<Math mode="inline" tex="\smash{\xymatrix{\rho({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}})\,f:z\ar@{|-&gt;}[r]&amp;e^{2i\pi%&#10;{{\langle{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}},{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\theta}}_{z}%&#10;}\rangle}}}f_{z}}\!}" text="[\xymatrix] * rho * n * f colon z * [\ar] * @ * ket@(-) * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; * e ^ (2 * i * pi * list@(n, theta _ z)) * f _ z" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m23">

                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="langle" role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>

                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m23.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp rpadding="-1.7pt">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}=(n_{1},\dots,n_{d})\in{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}" text="n = vector@(n _ 1, dots, n _ d) element-of Z ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m24">

                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m24.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m24.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in L^{2}(Z,\mu)" text="f element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(Z, mu)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m25.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m25.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m25.1">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m25.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We have</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex105">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}\in{Q}}||\rho({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}%&#10;)x-x||^{2}\leq 2\sup_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}\in{Q}}\bigl{|}1-{{\langle{%&#10;\rho({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}})x},{x}\rangle}}\bigr{|}&lt;\varepsilon^{2}," text="(supremum _ (n element-of Q))@((norm@(rho * n * x - x)) ^ 2) less= 2 * (supremum _ (n element-of Q))@(absolute-value@(1 - list@(rho * n * x, x))) less varepsilon ^ 2" xml:id="S7.Ex105.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex105.m1.4"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex105.m1.4">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                        <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex105.m1.4.1"/>
                          </XMApp>

                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex105.m1.4.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S7.Ex105.m1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex105.m1.1">n</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp scriptpos="mid">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="mid2"/>
                          <XMTok meaning="supremum" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="mid">sup</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex105.m1.4.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex105.m1.4.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S7.Ex105.m1.4.2.1"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S7.Ex105.m1.3"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex105.m1.4.2.1">
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex105.m1.2"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex105.m1.2">n</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex105.m1.3">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and since <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon" text="varepsilon" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan constant for <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m27">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as a subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}" text="Z ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has a non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}" text="Z ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m30">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector. There exists hence <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in L^{2}(Z,\mu)" text="f element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(Z, mu)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m31">

              </XMApp>

          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="||f||=1" text="norm@(f) = 1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m32">

              <XMApp>

          </Math> such that

            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}\in{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}" text="n element-of Z ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m34">

            </XMath>

          </Math>. For every <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in Z_{0}" text="z element-of Z _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m38">

            </XMath>
          </Math> we have

            </XMath>
          </Math>, which implies that

          </Math> and

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We have
<Math mode="inline" tex="\bigcup_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}\in{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}}Z_{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{n}}=Z_{0}" text="(union _ (n element-of Z ^ d))@(Z _ n) = Z _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m45">
            <XMath>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so there exists <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}_{0}\in{\mathbb{Z}}^{d}" text="n _ 0 element-of Z ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m46">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu(Z_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}_{0}})&gt;0" text="mu * Z _ n _ 0 &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m47">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m47.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m47.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Each subspace <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m48">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is easily seen to be invariant for <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m49">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and the representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}" text="pi _ n" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m50">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> induced by <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m51">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m52">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is given by <Math mode="inline" tex="\smash{\xymatrix{\pi_{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{t%&#10;}})\,f\,:\,z\ar@{|-&gt;}[r]&amp;e^{2i\pi{{\langle{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{t}},{%&#10;\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}\rangle}}}f_{z}}}" text="[\xymatrix] * pi _ n * t * f colon z * [\ar] * @ * ket@(-) * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; * e ^ (2 * i * pi * list@(t, n)) * f _ z" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m53">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\xymatrix</ERROR>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m53.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m53.3">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">f</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\ar</ERROR>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">@</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="ket"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m53.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m53.4">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="CLOSE">&gt;</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m53.5"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m53.5">r</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">&amp;</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m53.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m53.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="langle" role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m53.1">t</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m53.2">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{t}}\in{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="t element-of R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m54">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in H_{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}" text="f element-of H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m55">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. So <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m56">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> admits a subrepresentation of dimension <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m57">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as soon as <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m58">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is non-zero, i. e. as soon as <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu(Z_{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}})&gt;0" text="mu * Z _ n &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m59">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m59.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m59.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu(Z_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{n}}_{0}})&gt;0" text="mu * Z _ n _ 0 &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m60">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m60.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m60.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m61">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> admit a subrepresentation of dimension <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m62">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. This finishes the proof of our claim, and an application of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Theorem_2"/> shows that <Math mode="inline" tex="W_{n}\cup{Q}" text="W _ n union Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m63">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m64">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for some <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m65">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. If we choose <Math mode="inline" tex="W_{n}=B(0,n)" text="W _ n = B * open-interval@(0, n)" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m66">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">W</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m66.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m66.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m66.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m66.2">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq 1" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m67">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and proceed as in the proof of Example <ref labelref="LABEL:Example_8.5"/>, we obtain that <Math mode="inline" tex="B(0,\delta)\cup Q" text="B * open-interval@(0, delta) union Q" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m68">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="union" name="cup" role="ADDOP">∪</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m68.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS1.p14.m68.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m68.1">0</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m68.2">δ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{d}" text="R ^ d" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m69">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta&gt;0" text="delta &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m70">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.

We now move out of the commutative setting, and present a characterization of Kazhdan sets in the Heisenberg groups <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS1.p14.m71">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" labels="LABEL:Subsection_8.2" xml:id="S7.SS2">
      <tags>
        <tag>7.2</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection 7.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">7.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§7.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">7.2</tag>Kazhdan sets in the Heisenberg groups <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math></title>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS2.p1">
        <p>The Heisenberg group of dimension <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq 1" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, denoted by <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, is formed of triples <Math mode="inline" tex="(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})" text="vector@(t, q, p)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p1.m3.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p1.m3.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p1.m3.3"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m3.1">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m3.2">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m3.3">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}\times{\mathbb{R}}^{n}\times{\mathbb{R}}^{n}={\mathbb{R}}^{2n+1}" text="R * R ^ n * R ^ n = R ^ (2 * n + 1)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The group operation is given by</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex106">
          <Math mode="display" tex="(t_{1},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}_{1},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}_{1})%&#10;\cdot(t_{2},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}_{2},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}_{2%&#10;})=(t_{1}+t_{2}+\frac{1}{2}({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}_{1}\cdot{\mskip 1.5%&#10;mu \boldsymbol{q}}_{2}-{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}_{2}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{q}}_{1},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}_{1}+{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{q}}_{2},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}_{1}+{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}}_{2})," xml:id="S7.Ex106.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">t</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}" text="p cdot q" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> denotes the scalar product of two vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}" text="p" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}" text="q" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{n}" text="R ^ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Unitary representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are completely classified (see for instance <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="T" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Ch. 2]</cite>, or <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Fo" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Sec. 6.6]</cite>): there are two distinct families of such representations, which we denote respectively by <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mathcal{F}_{1})" text="F _ 1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p1.m10.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m10.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mathcal{F}_{2})" text="F _ 2" xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p1.m11.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p1.m11.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>:</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS2.p2">
        <p>– the representations belonging to the family <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mathcal{F}_{1})" text="F _ 1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p2.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m1.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{R}}^{n})" text="L ^ 2 * R ^ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p2.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the space of complex-valued square-summable functions on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{n}" text="R ^ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. They are parametrized by an element of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, which we write as <Math mode="inline" tex="\pm\lambda" text="plus-or-minus lambda" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda&gt;0" text="lambda &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then
<Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{\pm\lambda}(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})" text="pi _ (plus-or-minus lambda) * vector@(t, q, p)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p2.m8.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p2.m8.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p2.m8.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m8.1">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m8.2">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m8.3">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{\mathbb{R}}%&#10;^{2n+1}" text="vector@(t, q, p) element-of R ^ (2 * n + 1)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p2.m9.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p2.m9.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p2.m9.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m9.1">t</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m9.2">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m9.3">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, acts on <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{R}}^{n})" text="L ^ 2 * R ^ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p2.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m10.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex107">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\xymatrix{\pi_{\pm\lambda}(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}})\,u\,:\,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}\ar@{|-&gt;}[r]&amp;e^{i(\pm%&#10;\lambda t\pm\sqrt{\lambda}{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{x}}+\frac{\lambda}{2}{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5%&#10;mu \boldsymbol{p}})}u({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}+\sqrt{\lambda}\,{\mskip 1.%&#10;5mu \boldsymbol{p}})}" text="[\xymatrix] * pi _ (plus-or-minus lambda) * vector@(t, q, p) * u colon x * [\ar] * @ * ket@(-) * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; * e ^ (i * ((plus-or-minus lambda * t plus-or-minus (square-root@(lambda) * q) cdot x) + ((lambda / 2) * q) cdot p)) * u * (x + square-root@(lambda) * p)" xml:id="S7.Ex107.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP" rpadding="2.5pt">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\xymatrix</ERROR>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex107.m1.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex107.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex107.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex107.m1.2">t</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex107.m1.3">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex107.m1.4">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">u</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\ar</ERROR>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">@</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="ket"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex107.m1.5"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP" xml:id="S7.Ex107.m1.5">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="CLOSE">&gt;</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex107.m1.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>

        </equation>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="u" text="u" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belongs to <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}({\mathbb{R}}^{n})" text="L ^ 2 * R ^ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p2.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMath>
          </Math>.
These representations have the following important property, which will appear again in the next subsection:

      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_fact" inlist="thm theorem:fact" labels="LABEL:Fact_E" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem11">

        <para xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem11.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">For every <Math mode="inline" tex="\pm\lambda\in{\mathbb{R}}" text="plus-or-minus lambda element-of R" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem11.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>

              </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="u\in L^{2}({\mathbb{R}}^{n})" text="u element-of L ^ 2 * R ^ n" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem11.p1.m2">

      <ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS2.p3">
        <p>This follows directly from the dominated convergence theorem if <Math mode="inline" tex="u" text="u" xml:id="S7.SS2.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> has compact support in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{n}" text="R ^ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It then suffices to approximate <Math mode="inline" tex="u\in L^{2}({\mathbb{R}}^{n})" text="u element-of L ^ 2 * R ^ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">u</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p3.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p3.m3.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by functions with compact support to get the result.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS2.p4">
        <p>– The representations belonging to the family <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mathcal{F}_{2})" text="F _ 2" xml:id="S7.SS2.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p4.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p4.m1.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are one-dimensional. They are parametrized by elements <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}})" text="open-interval@(y, eta)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p4.m2.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p4.m2.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p4.m2.1">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p4.m2.2">η</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>: for every <Math mode="inline" tex="(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in H_{n}" text="vector@(t, q, p) element-of H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="vector"/>

                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p4.m4.2"/>

                  </XMApp>

                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p4.m4.2">q</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex109">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\pi_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}}}(t,{\mskip&#10;1%&#10;.5mu \boldsymbol{p}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}})=e^{i({\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{y}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}+{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{%&#10;\eta}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})}." text="pi _ (list@(y, eta)) * vector@(t, p, q) = e ^ (i * (y cdot q + eta cdot p))" xml:id="S7.Ex109.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex109.m1.7"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex109.m1.7">

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex109.m1.4"/>

                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex109.m1.6"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex109.m1.4">t</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex109.m1.5">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex109.m1.6">q</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex109.m1.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex109.m1.3">
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">+</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS2.p5">
        <p>Our main result concerning Kazhdan sets in <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p5.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math> is the following:</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_theorem" inlist="thm theorem:theorem" labels="LABEL:Proposition_F" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem12">

        <para xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem12.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem12.p1.m1">

                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>

      <para xml:id="S7.SS2.p6">
        <p>The proof of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_F"/> relies on the same kind of ideas as those employed in the proof of Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_D"/>. We start with the easy implication, which is that <Math mode="inline" tex="(1)" text="1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m1.1">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> implies <Math mode="inline" tex="(2)" text="2" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m2.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m2.1">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon&gt;0" text="varepsilon &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a Kazhdan constant for <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. In order to show that <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}_{0}" text="Q _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
