                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we apply Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_A"/>: let <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a probability measure on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that</p>

          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{Q}_{0}}%&#10;\,\bigl{|}\widehat{\sigma}({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}})-1\bigr{|}=\sup_{({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}})\in{Q}_{0}}\Bigl{|}\int_{{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}}e^{i({\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{y}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}+{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{%&#10;\eta}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})}d\sigma({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}%&#10;},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}})-1\Bigr{|}&lt;\dfrac{\varepsilon^{2}}{2}" text="(supremum _ (open-interval@(q, p) element-of Q _ 0))@(absolute-value@(widehat@(sigma) * open-interval@(q, p) - 1)) = (supremum _ (open-interval@(q, p) element-of Q _ 0))@(absolute-value@((integral _ (R ^ (2 * n)))@(e ^ (i * (y cdot q + eta cdot p)) * differential-d@(sigma) * open-interval@(y, eta)) - 1)) less varepsilon ^ 2 / 2" xml:id="S7.E15.m1">

                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.E15.m1.8"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S7.E15.m1.9"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E15.m1.8">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E15.m1.9">η</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and consider the representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m11">
            <XMath>

                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>

                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math> defined by</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex110">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\xymatrix{\rho(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})f%&#10;\,:\,({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}})\ar@{|-&gt;}%&#10;[r]&amp;e^{i({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}+{%&#10;\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})}f({\mskip 1%&#10;.5mu \boldsymbol{y}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}})}" text="[\xymatrix] * rho * vector@(t, q, p) * f colon open-interval@(y, eta) * [\ar] * @ * ket@(-) * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; * e ^ (i * (y cdot q + eta cdot p)) * f * open-interval@(y, eta)" xml:id="S7.Ex110.m1">

        <p>for every <Math mode="inline" tex="(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in H_{n}" text="vector@(t, q, p) element-of H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m14">

              <XMApp>

                  <XMApp>

                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m14.2">q</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in L^{2}({\mathbb{R}}^{2n},\sigma)" text="f element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(R ^ (2 * n), sigma)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m15">

              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then (<ref labelref="LABEL:Equation_20"/>) implies that the constant function <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathbbm{1}" text="1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q},\varepsilon)" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m17.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m17.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m17.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m17.2">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector for <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q},\varepsilon)" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m19.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m19.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m19.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m19.2">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan pair in <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> admits a non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant function <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in L^{2}({\mathbb{R}}^{2n},\sigma)" text="f element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(R ^ (2 * n), sigma)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m23.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m23.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m23.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m23.1">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Fix a representative of <Math mode="inline" tex="f" text="f" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and consider the subset <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> consisting of pairs <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}})" text="open-interval@(y, eta)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m27">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m27.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m27.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m27.1">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m27.2">η</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="f({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}})\neq 0" text="f * open-interval@(y, eta) not-equals 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m28.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m28.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m28.1">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m28.2">η</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(A)&gt;0" text="sigma * A &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m29.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m29.1">A</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m30">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-almost every element <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}})" text="open-interval@(y, eta)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m31">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m31.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m31.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m31.1">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m31.2">η</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m32">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> satisfies <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}+{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{\eta}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}\in 2\pi{\mathbb{Z}}" text="y cdot q + eta cdot p element-of 2 * pi * Z" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m33">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{\mathbb{Q}}^{%&#10;2n}" text="open-interval@(q, p) element-of Q ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m34">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m34.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m34.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m34.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m34.2">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By continuity, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}+{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{\eta}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}" text="y cdot q + eta cdot p" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m35">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">+</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belongs to <Math mode="inline" tex="2\pi{\mathbb{Z}}" text="2 * pi * Z" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m36">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{\mathbb{R}}^{%&#10;2n}" text="open-interval@(q, p) element-of R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m37">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m37.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m37.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m37.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m37.2">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so that <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}})=({\mskip 1.5%&#10;mu \boldsymbol{0}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}})" text="open-interval@(y, eta) = open-interval@(0, 0)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m38">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m38.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m38.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m38.1">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m38.2">η</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m38.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m38.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m38.3">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m38.4">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We have thus proved that
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(\{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}}\})&gt;0" text="sigma * set@(0, 0) &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m39">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m39.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m39.3">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m39.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p6.m39.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m39.1">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m39.2">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and it follows from Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_A"/> that <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}_{0}" text="Q _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m40">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p6.m41">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS2.p7">
        <p>Let us now prove the converse implication. Suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}_{0}" text="Q _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="0&lt;\varepsilon&lt;3" text="0 less varepsilon less 3" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a Kazhdan constant for <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}_{0}" text="Q _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a unitary representation of <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on a separable Hilbert space <Math mode="inline" tex="H" text="H" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, which admits a <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q},\frac{\varepsilon}{8})" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon / 8)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p7.m8.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p7.m8.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m8.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m8.2">
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="8" role="NUMBER">8</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in H" text="x element-of H" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of norm <Math mode="inline" tex="1" text="1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We write as usual <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as a direct integral <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi=\int_{Z}^{\oplus}\pi_{z}\,d\mu(z)" text="pi = ((integral _ Z) ^ direct-sum)@(pi _ z * differential-d@(mu) * z)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="direct-sum" name="oplus" role="ADDOP">⊕</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p7.m12.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m12.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a finite Borel measure on a standard Borel space <Math mode="inline" tex="Z" text="Z" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="x" text="x" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> as <Math mode="inline" tex="(x_{z})_{z\in Z}" text="x _ z _ (z element-of Z)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p7.m16.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m16.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, with
<Math mode="inline" tex="\int_{Z}||x_{z}||^{2}d\mu(z)=1" text="(integral _ Z)@((norm@(x _ z)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(mu) * z) = 1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p7.m17.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m17.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p7.m17.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p7.m17.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We have</p>

          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{Q}}\,%&#10;\Bigl{|}1-\int_{Z}{{\langle{\pi_{z}(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.%&#10;5mu \boldsymbol{p}})x_{z}},{x_{z}}\rangle}}d\mu(z)\Bigr{|}&lt;\dfrac{\varepsilon}%&#10;{8}\cdot" xml:id="S7.E16.m1">

We now observe the following:</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lemma" inlist="thm theorem:lemma" labels="LABEL:Lemma_G" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem13">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma 7.13</tag>
          <tag role="autoref">7.13</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">7.13</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 7.13</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 7.13</text></tag></title>
<!--  %**** String Line 2225 **** -->        <para xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">A Kazhdan subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> contains elements <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})" text="open-interval@(q, p)" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m2.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m2.1">q</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m2.2">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> such that the Euclidean norm <Math mode="inline" tex="|{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}|" text="absolute-value@(p)" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m3.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="bold" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m3.1">p</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMath>
              </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}" text="p" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem13.p1.m4">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok font="bold" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> is arbitrarily large.</text></p>
        </para>
      </theorem>
      <ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS2.p8">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}_{0}" text="Q _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a Kazhdan subset of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, with Kazhdan constant <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon&gt;0" text="varepsilon &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and suppose that there exists a constant <Math mode="inline" tex="M&gt;0" text="M &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> such that <Math mode="inline" tex="|{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}|\leq M" text="absolute-value@(p) less= M" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p8.m5.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m5.1">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{Q}_{0}" text="open-interval@(q, p) element-of Q _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p8.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p8.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m6.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m6.2">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\delta&gt;0" text="delta &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be such that <Math mode="inline" tex="2M\delta&lt;\varepsilon" text="2 * M * delta less varepsilon" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and consider the probability measure on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> defined by</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex111">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sigma=\delta_{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}}\times\mathbbm{1}_{B({\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{0}},\delta)}\,\dfrac{d{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}}{|B({\mskip 1.%&#10;5mu \boldsymbol{0}},\delta)|}\cdot" xml:id="S7.Ex111.m1">

                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>

                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                </XMDual>

              <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP">⋅</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>For every <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{Q}" text="open-interval@(q, p) element-of Q" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m10.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m10.2">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex112">
          <Math mode="display" tex="|\widehat{\sigma}({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})%&#10;-1|=\Bigl{|}\int_{B({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}},\delta)}e^{i{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{s}}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}}\,\dfrac{d{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{s}}}{|B({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}},\delta)|}-1\Bigr{|}\leq 2%&#10;\delta|{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}|\leq 2M\delta&lt;\varepsilon." text="absolute-value@(widehat@(sigma) * open-interval@(q, p) - 1) = absolute-value@((integral _ (B * open-interval@(0, delta)))@(e ^ ((i * s) cdot p) * ((d * s) / absolute-value@(B * open-interval@(0, delta)))) - 1) less= 2 * delta * absolute-value@(p) less= 2 * M * delta less varepsilon" xml:id="S7.Ex112.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex112.m1.9"/>

                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                              <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.Ex112.m1.8"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex112.m1.8">p</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="delta" role="UNKNOWN">δ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>But <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma(\{({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}})\})=0" text="sigma * set@(open-interval@(0, 0)) = 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p8.m11.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m11.3">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="set"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p8.m11.3.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m11.3.1">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p8.m11.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p8.m11.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m11.1">0</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m11.2">0</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and it follows from Proposition <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_A"/> that <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}_{0}" text="Q _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p8.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, which is a contradiction.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS2.p9">
        <p>By Fact <ref labelref="LABEL:Fact_E"/>, we have for every <Math mode="inline" tex="x\in Z_{1}" text="x element-of Z _ 1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math></p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex113">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\xymatrix{{{\langle{\pi_{\pm\lambda_{z}}(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{%&#10;\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})x_{z}},{x_{z}}\rangle}}\ar[r]&amp;0}\quad\textrm{as}%&#10;\ \xymatrix@C=10pt{|{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}|\ar[r]&amp;+\infty},\ (t,{\mskip&#10;1%&#10;.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in H_{n}." text="formulae@(list@([\xymatrix] * list@(pi _ (plus-or-minus lambda _ z) * vector@(t, q, p) * x _ z, x _ z) * [\ar] * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; * 0, [as] * [\xymatrix] * @ * C) = 10 * p * t * absolute-value@(p) * [\ar] * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; + infinity, vector@(t, q, p) element-of H _ n)" xml:id="S7.Ex113.m1">

        </equation>
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="|{{\langle{\pi_{\pm\lambda}(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}})x_{z}},{x_{z}}\rangle}}|\leq||x_{z}||^{2}" text="absolute-value@(list@(pi _ (plus-or-minus lambda) * vector@(t, q, p) * x _ z, x _ z)) less= (norm@(x _ z)) ^ 2" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m2.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m2.4">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m2.4.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m2.4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m2.4.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="vector"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m2.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m2.2"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m2.3"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m2.1">t</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m2.2">q</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m2.3">p</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m2.4.2">
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                        <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>

                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m2.5"/>

                      <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m2.5">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in Z_{1}" text="z element-of Z _ 1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and
<Math mode="inline" tex="\int_{Z}||x_{z}||^{2}d\mu(z)=1" text="(integral _ Z)@((norm@(x _ z)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(mu) * z) = 1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m4.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m4.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m4.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the dominated convergence theorem implies that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex114">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\xymatrix{{\displaystyle}\int_{Z_{1}}{{\langle{\pi_{\pm\lambda_{z}}(t,{\mskip 1%&#10;.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})x_{z}},{x_{z}}\rangle}}d\mu%&#10;(z)\ar[r]&amp;0}\quad\textrm{as}\ \xymatrix@C=10pt{|{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}|%&#10;\ar[r]&amp;+\infty},\ (t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p%&#10;}})\in H_{n}." text="formulae@(list@([\xymatrix] * (integral _ Z _ 1)@(list@(pi _ (plus-or-minus lambda _ z) * vector@(t, q, p) * x _ z, x _ z) * differential-d@(mu) * z * [\ar] * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; * 0), [as] * [\xymatrix] * @ * C) = 10 * p * t * absolute-value@(p) * [\ar] * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; + infinity, vector@(t, q, p) element-of H _ n)" xml:id="S7.Ex114.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex114.m1.11"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S7.Ex114.m1.11">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex114.m1.11.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex114.m1.11.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex114.m1.11.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex114.m1.11.1.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S7.Ex114.m1.11.1.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex114.m1.11.1.1">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <ERROR class="undefined">\xymatrix</ERROR>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex114.m1.11.1.1.1"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex114.m1.11.1.1.2"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex114.m1.11.1.1.1">
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                                          <XMApp>
                                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post7"/>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>

        <p>By Lemma <ref labelref="LABEL:Lemma_G"/>, there exists an element <Math mode="inline" tex="(t_{0},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}_{0},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}_{0})" text="vector@(t _ 0, q _ 0, p _ 0)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="vector"/>

                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m5.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m5.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m5.3">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>

                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="|{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}_{0}|" text="absolute-value@(p _ 0)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>

                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> so large that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex115">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Bigl{|}\int_{Z_{1}}{{\langle{\pi_{\pm\lambda_{z}}(t_{0},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{q}}_{0},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}_{0})x_{z}},{x_{z}}\rangle}}d%&#10;\mu(z)\Bigr{|}&lt;\dfrac{\varepsilon}{8}\cdot" xml:id="S7.Ex115.m1">

        <p>Property (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq17"/>) implies then that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex116">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Bigl{|}1-\int_{Z_{2}}\pi_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}_{z},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{\eta}}_{z}}(t_{0},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}_{0},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}}_{0})|x_{z}|^{2}d\mu(z)\Bigr{|}&lt;\dfrac{\varepsilon}{4}" text="absolute-value@(1 - (integral _ Z _ 2)@(pi _ (list@(y _ z, eta _ z)) * vector@(t _ 0, q _ 0, p _ 0) * (absolute-value@(x _ z)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(mu) * z)) less varepsilon / 4" xml:id="S7.Ex116.m1">

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>from which it follows that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\displaystyle}\int_{Z_{2}}|x_{z}|^{2}d\mu(z)&gt;1-\dfrac{\varepsilon}{4}" text="(integral _ Z _ 2)@((absolute-value@(x _ z)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(mu) * z) &gt; 1 - varepsilon / 4" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m8.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m8.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m8.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m8.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so that
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\displaystyle}\int_{Z_{1}}||x_{z}||^{2}d\mu(z)&lt;\dfrac{\varepsilon}{4}" text="(integral _ Z _ 1)@((norm@(x _ z)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(mu) * z) less varepsilon / 4" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m9.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m9.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m9.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m9.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Plugging this into (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq17"/>) yields that</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex117">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{Q}}\,%&#10;\Bigl{|}1-\int_{Z_{2}}\pi_{{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}_{z},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{\eta}}_{z}}(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}})|x_{z}|^{2}d\mu(z)\Bigr{|}&lt;\dfrac{3\varepsilon}{8}\cdot" xml:id="S7.Ex117.m1">
