        </equation>
        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\int_{Z_{2}}|x_{z}|^{2}d\mu(z)&gt;1-\varepsilon/4" text="(integral _ Z _ 2)@((absolute-value@(x _ z)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(mu) * z) &gt; 1 - varepsilon / 4" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m10.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m10.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m10.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m10.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="0&lt;\varepsilon&lt;3" text="0 less varepsilon less 3" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than" role="RELOP">&lt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we can, by normalizing the family <Math mode="inline" tex="(x_{z})_{z\in Z_{2}}" text="x _ z _ (z element-of Z _ 2)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m12.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m12.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, suppose without loss of generality that <Math mode="inline" tex="Z=Z_{2}" text="Z = Z _ 2" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\int_{Z}|x_{z}|^{2}d\mu(z)=1" text="(integral _ Z)@((absolute-value@(x _ z)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(mu) * z) = 1" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m14.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m14.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m14.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m14.1">z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and that</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:Eq18" xml:id="S7.E17">
          <tags>
            <tag>(17)</tag>

            <tag role="refnum">17</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\sup_{(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{Q}}\,%&#10;\Bigl{|}1-\int_{Z}e^{i({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{q}}+{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}})}\,|x_{z}|^{2\,}d\mu(z)\Bigr{|}&lt;\varepsilon." text="(supremum _ (vector@(t, q, p) element-of Q))@(absolute-value@(1 - (integral _ Z)@(e ^ (i * (y _ z cdot q + eta _ z cdot p)) * (absolute-value@(x _ z)) ^ 2 * differential-d@(mu) * z))) less varepsilon" xml:id="S7.E17.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.E17.m1.6"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.E17.m1.6">

                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="integral" name="int" role="INTOP">∫</XMTok>

                              <XMApp>

                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                                    <XMDual>
                                      <XMRef idref="S7.E17.m1.4"/>
                                      <XMWrap>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.E17.m1.4">
                                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">+</XMTok>

                                <XMApp>

                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S7.E17.m1.6.1.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.E17.m1.6.1.1">
                                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER" rpadding="1.7pt">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" meaning="differential-d" role="DIFFOP">d</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S7.E17.m1.5"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.E17.m1.5">z</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="160%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Consider now the unitary representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(Z,\mu)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(Z, mu)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m17.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m17.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m17.1">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m17.2">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> defined by</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex118">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\xymatrix{\rho({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\,f%&#10;\,:\,z\ar@{|-&gt;}[r]&amp;e^{i({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{q}}+{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}})}f_{z}}" text="[\xymatrix] * rho * open-interval@(q, p) * f colon z * [\ar] * @ * ket@(-) * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; * e ^ (i * (y _ z cdot q + eta _ z cdot p)) * f _ z" xml:id="S7.Ex118.m1">

        <p>for every <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{\mathbb{R}}^{%&#10;2n}" text="open-interval@(q, p) element-of R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m18.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m18.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m18.2">p</XMTok>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="f=(f_{z})_{z\in Z}\in L^{2}(Z,\mu)" text="f = f _ z _ (z element-of Z) element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(Z, mu)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>

                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m19.3"/>

                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>

                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m19.1"/>

                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                    </XMWrap>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq18"/>) can be
rewritten as</p>

          <equation xml:id="S7.Ex119">

                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>

                </XMath>
              </Math>
              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\sup_{(t,{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{%&#10;p}})\in{Q}}\,\bigl{|}1-{{\langle{\rho({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.%&#10;5mu \boldsymbol{p}})x},{x}\rangle}}\bigr{|}&lt;\varepsilon,\quad\textrm{i.e.}%&#10;\quad\sup_{({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{Q}%&#10;_{0}}\,\bigl{|}1-{{\langle{\rho({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{p}})x},{x}\rangle}}\bigr{|}&lt;\varepsilon." text="formulae@((supremum _ (vector@(t, q, p) element-of Q))@(absolute-value@(1 - list@(rho * open-interval@(q, p) * x, x))) less list@(varepsilon, [i.e.]), (supremum _ (open-interval@(q, p) element-of Q _ 0))@(absolute-value@(1 - list@(rho * open-interval@(q, p) * x, x))) less varepsilon)" xml:id="S7.Ex119.m1">
