        <p>Since <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon" text="varepsilon" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan constant for <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}_{0}" text="Q _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, the representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho" text="rho" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> admits a non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}^{2n}" text="R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in L^{2}(Z,\mu)" text="f element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(Z, mu)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m24.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m24.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m24.1">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m24.2">μ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Proceeding as in the proof of <Math mode="inline" tex="(1)\Longrightarrow(2)" text="1 Longrightarrow 2" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="Longrightarrow" role="ARROW">⟹</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m25.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m25.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m25.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m25.2">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we see that for every <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{\mathbb{R}}^{%&#10;2n}" text="open-interval@(q, p) element-of R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m26.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m26.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m26.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m26.2">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="e^{i({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}+{%&#10;\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})}f(z)=f(z)" text="e ^ (i * (y _ z cdot q + eta _ z cdot p)) * f * z = f * z" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m27">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m27.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m27.1">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">+</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m27.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m27.2">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m27.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m27.3">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu" text="mu" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-almost everywhere on <Math mode="inline" tex="Z" text="Z" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so that there exists a subset <Math mode="inline" tex="Z_{0}" text="Z _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m30">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="Z" text="Z" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m31">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu(Z_{0})&gt;0" text="mu * Z _ 0 &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m32">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m32.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m32.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
such that <Math mode="inline" tex="f(z)\neq 0" text="f * z not-equals 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m33">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m33.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m33.1">z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in Z_{0}" text="z element-of Z _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m34">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}+{\mskip 1.%&#10;5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}" text="y _ z cdot q + eta _ z cdot p" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m35">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">+</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belongs to <Math mode="inline" tex="2\pi{\mathbb{Z}}" text="2 * pi * Z" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m36">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in Z_{0}" text="z element-of Z _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m37">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{\mathbb{Q}}^{%&#10;2n}" text="open-interval@(q, p) element-of Q ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m38">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m38.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m38.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m38.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m38.2">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. By continuity, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}}+{\mskip 1.%&#10;5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}}_{z}\cdot{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}}" text="y _ z cdot q + eta _ z cdot p" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m39">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP" rpadding="0.8pt">+</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">q</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="cdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="0.8pt">⋅</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belongs to <Math mode="inline" tex="2\pi{\mathbb{Z}}" text="2 * pi * Z" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m40">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in Z_{0}" text="z element-of Z _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m41">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and every <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{q}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{p}})\in{\mathbb{R}}^{%&#10;2n}" text="open-interval@(q, p) element-of R ^ (2 * n)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m42">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m42.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m42.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m42.1">q</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m42.2">p</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so that <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}_{z},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{\eta}}_{z})=({%&#10;\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}},{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}})" text="open-interval@(y _ z, eta _ z) = open-interval@(0, 0)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m43">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m43.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m43.4"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m43.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m43.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                      <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m43.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m43.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m43.1">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m43.2">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="z\in Z_{0}" text="z element-of Z _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m44">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. So if we set <Math mode="inline" tex="Z_{0}^{\prime}=\{z\in Z\,;\,({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}_{z},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{\eta}}_{z})=({\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{0}},{\mskip 1.5mu %&#10;\boldsymbol{0}})\}" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m45">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">Z</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="1.7pt">;</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" name="eta" role="UNKNOWN">η</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">z</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m45.1">0</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="bold" meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m45.2">0</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have <Math mode="inline" tex="\mu(Z_{0}^{\prime})&gt;0" text="mu * (Z _ 0) ^ prime &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m46">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m46.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m46.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The function
<Math mode="inline" tex="f=\mathbbm{1}_{Z^{\prime}_{0}}" text="f = 1 _ (Z ^ prime) _ 0" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m47">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">Z</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is hence a non-zero element of <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}(Z,\mu)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(Z, mu)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m48">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m48.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m48.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m48.1">Z</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m48.2">μ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, which is clearly an <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m49">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-invariant vector for the representation <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi" text="pi" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m50">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. So <Math mode="inline" tex="({Q},\frac{\varepsilon}{8})" text="open-interval@(Q, varepsilon / 8)" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m51">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m51.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS2.p9.m51.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m51.1">Q</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m51.2">
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="8" role="NUMBER">8</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan pair in <Math mode="inline" tex="H_{n}" text="H _ n" xml:id="S7.SS2.p9.m52">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_F"/> is proved.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" xml:id="S7.SS3">
      <tags>
        <tag>7.3</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection 7.3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">7.3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§7.3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">7.3</tag>Kazhdan sets in the <Math mode="inline" tex="\bm{ax+b}" text="a * x + b" xml:id="S7.SS3.m1">
          <XMath>
            <XMApp>
              <XMTok font="bold" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
            </XMApp>
          </XMath>
        </Math> group</title>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS3.p1">
        <p>The underlying space of the <Math mode="inline" tex="ax+b" text="a * x + b" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> group is <Math mode="inline" tex="(0,+\infty)\times{\mathbb{R}}" text="open-interval@(0, + infinity) * R" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m2.1">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m2.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and the group law is given by
<Math mode="inline" tex="(a,b)(a^{\prime},b^{\prime})=(aa^{\prime},b+ab^{\prime})" text="open-interval@(a, b) * open-interval@(a ^ prime, b ^ prime) = open-interval@(a * a ^ prime, b + a * b ^ prime)" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m3.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m3.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m3.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m3.2">b</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m3.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m3.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m3.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m3.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m3.5"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m3.6"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m3.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m3.6">
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="(a,b)" text="open-interval@(a, b)" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m4.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m4.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m4.1">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m4.2">b</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="(a^{\prime},b^{\prime})" text="open-interval@(a ^ prime, b ^ prime)" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m5.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m5.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m5.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m5.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="prime" role="SUPOP">′</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belong to <Math mode="inline" tex="(0,+\infty)\times{\mathbb{R}}" text="open-interval@(0, + infinity) * R" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">×</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m6.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p1.m6.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m6.1">0</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m6.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We denote this group by <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. As in the case of the Heisenberg groups, the irreducible unitary representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S7.SS3.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are completely classified (see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Fo" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Sec. 6.7]</cite>) and fall within two classes:</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS3.p2">
        <p>– the class <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mathcal{F}_{1})" text="F _ 1" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m1.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m1.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> consists of two infinite dimensional representations <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{+}" text="pi _ +" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{-}" text="pi _ -" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, which act respectively on the Hilbert spaces <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}((0,+\infty),ds)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(open-interval@(0, + infinity), d * s)" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m5.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m5.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m5.2">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m5.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m5.2.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m5.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m5.2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m5.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="L^{2}((-\infty,0),ds)" text="L ^ 2 * open-interval@(open-interval@(- infinity, 0), d * s)" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m6.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m6.3"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMDual xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m6.2">
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m6.2.1"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m6.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m6.2.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m6.1">0</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m6.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. They are both defined by the formula</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex120">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\xymatrix{\pi_{\pm}(a,b)f\,:\,s\ar@{|-&gt;}[r]&amp;\sqrt{a}\,e^{2i\pi bs}f(as)}" text="[\xymatrix] * pi _ plus-or-minus * open-interval@(a, b) * f colon s * [\ar] * @ * ket@(-) * delimited-[]@(r) * &amp; * square-root@(a) * e ^ (2 * i * pi * b * s) * f * a * s" xml:id="S7.Ex120.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP" rpadding="1.7pt">:</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\xymatrix</ERROR>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus-or-minus" name="pm" role="ADDOP">±</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex120.m1.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex120.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex120.m1.1">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex120.m1.2">b</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" rpadding="1.7pt">f</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\ar</ERROR>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">@</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="ket"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex120.m1.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP" xml:id="S7.Ex120.m1.3">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="CLOSE">&gt;</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="delimited-[]"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex120.m1.4"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">[</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex120.m1.4">r</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">]</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">&amp;</XMTok>
                  <XMApp rpadding="1.7pt">
                    <XMTok meaning="square-root"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.Ex120.m1.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex120.m1.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="(a,b)\in G" text="open-interval@(a, b) element-of G" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m7.1">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m7.2">b</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in L^{2}((0,+\infty),ds)" text="f element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(open-interval@(0, + infinity), d * s)" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m8.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m8.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m8.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m8.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m8.2.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m8.1">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m8.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m8.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in the case of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{+}" text="pi _ +" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in L^{2}((-\infty,0),ds)" text="f element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(open-interval@(- infinity, 0), d * s)" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">f</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">L</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m10.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m10.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMDual xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m10.2">
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m10.2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p2.m10.1"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m10.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m10.1">0</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m10.3">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> in the case of <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{-}" text="pi _ -" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It is a direct consequence of the Riemann-Lebesgue lemma that the analogue of Fact <ref labelref="LABEL:Fact_E"/> holds true for the two representations <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{+}" text="pi _ +" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{-}" text="pi _ -" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S7.SS3.p2.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>:</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_fact" inlist="thm theorem:fact" labels="LABEL:Fact_M" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem14">

        <para xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem14.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">For every <Math mode="inline" tex="f\in L^{2}((0,+\infty),ds)" text="f element-of L ^ 2 * open-interval@(open-interval@(0, + infinity), d * s)" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem14.p1.m1">

              </Math>, we have</text></p>
          <equation xml:id="S7.Ex121">

      <para xml:id="S7.SS3.p3">
        <p>– the representations of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S7.SS3.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belonging to the family <Math mode="inline" tex="(\mathcal{F}_{2})" text="F _ 2" xml:id="S7.SS3.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p3.m2.1"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S7.SS3.p3.m2.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">F</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are one-dimensional. They are parametrized by <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{R}}" text="R" xml:id="S7.SS3.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and <Math mode="inline" tex="\pi_{\lambda}" text="pi _ lambda" xml:id="S7.SS3.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is defined for every <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda\in{\mathbb{R}}" text="lambda element-of R" xml:id="S7.SS3.p3.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by the formula</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex122">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\pi_{\lambda}(a,b)=a^{i\lambda}\quad\textrm{for every}\ (a,b)\in G." text="formulae@(pi _ lambda * open-interval@(a, b) = a ^ (i * lambda), [for every] * open-interval@(a, b) element-of G)" xml:id="S7.Ex122.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S7.Ex122.m1.5"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMDual xml:id="S7.Ex122.m1.5">
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex122.m1.5.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S7.Ex122.m1.5.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex122.m1.5.1">
                        <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex122.m1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex122.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex122.m1.1">a</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex122.m1.2">b</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="quad" role="PUNCT"> </XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex122.m1.5.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMText rpadding="5.0pt">for every</XMText>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex122.m1.3"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S7.Ex122.m1.4"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex122.m1.3">a</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S7.Ex122.m1.4">b</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Proceeding as in the proof of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_F"/>, we characterize the Kazhdan subsets of the <Math mode="inline" tex="ax+b" text="a * x + b" xml:id="S7.SS3.p3.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> group in the following way:</p>
      </para>
      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_theorem" inlist="thm theorem:theorem" labels="LABEL:Proposition_N" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem15">
        <tags>
          <tag>Theorem 7.15</tag>

        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 7.15</text></tag></title>
        <para xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem15.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem15.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be a subset of the <Math mode="inline" tex="ax+b" text="a * x + b" xml:id="S7.Thmtheorem15.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">b</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math> group G. The following assertions are equivalent:</text></p>
          <enumerate xml:id="S7.I5">

                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>

                  </Math><text font="italic"> is a Kazhdan set in </text><Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S7.I5.ix32.p1.m2">

            <item xml:id="S7.I5.ix33">

              <para xml:id="S7.I5.ix33.p1">
                <p><text font="italic">the set </text><Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}_{0}=\{t\in{\mathbb{R}}\,;\,\exists\,b\in{\mathbb{R}}\ (e^{t},b)\in{Q}\}" xml:id="S7.I5.ix33.p1.m1">

                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

      </theorem>
      <ERROR class="undefined">{proof}</ERROR>
      <para xml:id="S7.SS3.p4">
        <p>The proof is similar to that of Theorem <ref labelref="LABEL:Proposition_F"/>, and we will not give it in full detail here. Let us first sketch briefly a proof of the implication <Math mode="inline" tex="(1)\Longrightarrow(2)" text="1 Longrightarrow 2" xml:id="S7.SS3.p4.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="Longrightarrow" role="ARROW">⟹</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p4.m1.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS3.p4.m1.1">1</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="S7.SS3.p4.m1.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER" xml:id="S7.SS3.p4.m1.2">2</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Suppose that <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS3.p4.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a Kazhdan set in <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="S7.SS3.p4.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="\varepsilon&gt;0" text="varepsilon &gt; 0" xml:id="S7.SS3.p4.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="varepsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ε</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a Kazhdan constant for <Math mode="inline" tex="{Q}" text="Q" xml:id="S7.SS3.p4.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">Q</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Consider a probability measure <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma" text="sigma" xml:id="S7.SS3.p4.m6">

            <XMath>

            </XMath>
          </Math> such that</p>

          </Math> Since</p>
        <equation xml:id="S7.Ex123">
          <Math mode="display" tex="||\rho(a,b)\mathbbm{1}-\mathbbm{1}||^{2}\leq 2\Bigl{|}\int_{\mathbb{R}}\bigl{(%&#10;}e^{is(\ln a)}-1)d\sigma(s)\Bigr{|}\quad\textrm{for every}\ (a,b)\in G," text="formulae@((norm@(rho * open-interval@(a, b) * 1 - 1)) ^ 2 less= 2 * absolute-value@((integral _ R)@((e ^ (i * s * natural-logarithm@(a)) - 1) * differential-d@(sigma) * s)), [for every] * open-interval@(a, b) element-of G)" xml:id="S7.Ex123.m1">

              <XMDual>

                      <XMApp xml:id="S7.Ex123.m1.7.2">
                        <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>

                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
