                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS1.p6">
        <p>If <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is an equivalence class of <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{0}" text="C _ 0" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-sequences, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{{\mathcal{A}}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ A)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
admits another, more transparent description, which runs as follows
<cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="VN" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lem. 4.1.2]</cite>, see also <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Gui" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Rem. 1.1]</cite>: let <Math mode="inline" tex="{({a_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="a _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p6.m4.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m4.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a
sequence with <Math mode="inline" tex="{a_{n}}\in{H_{n}}" text="a _ n element-of H _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="||{a_{n}}||=1" text="norm@(a _ n) = 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p6.m6.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m6.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, such that the equivalence class of
<Math mode="inline" tex="{({a_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="a _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p6.m8.1"/>

                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>

                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (such a sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="{({a_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="a _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p6.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                <XMApp>

                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> does exist: if <Math mode="inline" tex="{({x_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="x _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

            </XMath>
          </Math> is any non-zero <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{0}" text="C _ 0" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMath>
          </Math>-sequence belonging to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="x_{n}" text="x _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is non-zero for every <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq 1" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and we can define a <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{0}" text="C _ 0" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="{({a_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="a _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p6.m17.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m17.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>

                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by setting <Math mode="inline" tex="a_{n}=x_{n}/||x_{n}||" text="a _ n = x _ n / norm@(x _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m18">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="divide" role="MULOP">/</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="norm"/>

                      <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m18.1">
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq 1" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m19">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. It is not difficult to check that <Math mode="inline" tex="{({a_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="a _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m20">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p6.m20.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m20.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is equivalent to <Math mode="inline" tex="{({x_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="x _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m21">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p6.m21.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m21.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and so belongs to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m22">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>). Then <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{{\mathcal{A}}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ A)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m23">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> coincides with the closed linear span
in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}{H_{n}}}" text="(tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1))@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m24">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}={{\otimes}_{n\geq 1}{x_{n}}}" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m25">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="{x_{n}}={a_{n}}" text="x _ n = a _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m26">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for all
but finitely many integers <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m27">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Denoting the vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\otimes}_{n\geq 1}{a_{n}}}" text="absent tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1) a _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m28">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="tensor-product" role="MULOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> by <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}" text="a" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m29">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
we write this closed linear span as <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m30">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> (see <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Gui" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>), and
thus <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}={\bigotimes_{n\geq&#10;1%&#10;}^{{\mathcal{A}}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n) = ((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ A)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m31">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathcal{A}}" text="A" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m32">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="caligraphic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the equivalence class of
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}" text="a" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m33">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The space <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m34">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is usually called <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">the Guichardet
tensor product</text> of the spaces <Math mode="inline" tex="{H_{n}}" text="H _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m35">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">associated to the sequence</text>
<!--  %**** String Line 2575 **** --><Math mode="inline" tex="{({a_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="a _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m36">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p6.m36.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Proposition 1.1 of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Gui" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> states the following, which is a direct consequence of
the discussion above: if <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}={({x_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="x = x _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m37">

              <XMApp>

                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>

            </XMath>
          </Math> is a <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{0}" text="C _ 0" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m38">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-sequence
which is equivalent to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}" text="a" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m39">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}" text="x" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m40">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> belongs to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m41">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>

                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Vectors
<Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}" text="x" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m42">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of this form are also said to be <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">decomposable with respect
to</text> <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}" text="a" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m43">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, while vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}={({x_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="x = x _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m44">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                  </XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with <Math mode="inline" tex="{x_{n}}={a_{n}}" text="x _ n = a _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m45">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for all but finitely
many indices <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m46">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> are called <text class="ltx_emph" font="italic">elementary vectors</text> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p6.m47">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>

                </XMApp>

          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS1.p7">
        <p>Suppose that all the spaces <Math mode="inline" tex="{H_{n}}" text="H _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, are separable.
For each <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, let <Math mode="inline" tex="(e_{p,n})_{1\leq p\leq p_{n}}" text="e _ (list@(p, n)) _ (1 less= p less= p _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m4">

              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p7.m4.3"/>

                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>

                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a Hilbertian basis of
<Math mode="inline" tex="{H_{n}}" text="H _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

              </XMApp>

              <XMApp>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>

            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="e_{1,n}=a_{n}" text="e _ (list@(1, n)) = a _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                    <XMApp>

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m7.1">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m7.2">n</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. The family of all
elementary vectors <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{e}}_{\beta}={\otimes}_{n\geq 1}e_{\beta(n),n}" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m8">
            <XMath>

              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p7.m8.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p7.m8.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m8.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p7.m8.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m8.1">n</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m8.2">n</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where
<Math mode="inline" tex="\beta" text="beta" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a map from <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mathbb{N}}" text="N" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> into itself such that <Math mode="inline" tex="1\leq\beta(n)\leq p_{n}" text="1 less= beta * n less= p _ n" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p7.m12.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m12.1">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="less-than-or-equals" name="leq" role="RELOP">≤</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">p</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\beta(n)=1" text="beta * n = 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="beta" role="UNKNOWN">β</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS1.p7.m14.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m14.1">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for all but finitely many integers <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq 1" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, forms a Hilbertian basis of <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="VN" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Lem. 4.1.4]</cite>. In
particular, <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS1.p7.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a separable complex Hilbert space.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
    <subsection inlist="toc" xml:id="A1.SS2">
      <tags>
        <tag>A.2</tag>
        <tag role="autoref">subsection A.2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">A.2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">§A.2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title><tag close=" ">A.2</tag>Tensor products of unitary representations</title>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS2.p1">
        <p>Let <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a topological group, and let <Math mode="inline" tex="({H_{n}})_{n\geq 1}" text="H _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m2.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m2.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a sequence of
complex separable Hilbert spaces. Let <Math mode="inline" tex="{({a_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="a _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m3.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m3.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a sequence of
vectors with <Math mode="inline" tex="{a_{n}}\in{H_{n}}" text="a _ n element-of H _ n" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="||{a_{n}}||=1" text="norm@(a _ n) = 1" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m5.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m5.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for every <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We are
looking
for conditions under which one can define a unitary representation
<Math mode="inline" tex="\boldsymbol{\pi}" text="pi" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
of <Math mode="inline" tex="G" text="G" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> which satisfies</p>
        <equation labels="LABEL:Eq1" xml:id="A1.E22">
          <tags>
            <tag>(22)</tag>
            <tag role="autoref">Equation 22</tag>
            <tag role="refnum">22</tag>
          </tags>
          <Math mode="display" tex="\boldsymbol{\pi}(g){{\otimes}_{n\geq 1}{x_{n}}}={\otimes}_{n\geq 1}\pi_{n}(g){%&#10;x_{n}}" xml:id="A1.E22.m1">
            <XMath>
<!--  %**** String Line 2600 **** -->              <XMTok font="bold italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.E22.m1.1">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>for every <Math mode="inline" tex="g\in G" text="g element-of G" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and every decomposable vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}={{\otimes}_{n\geq 1}{x_{n}}}" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with respect
to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}" text="a" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Observe that without any assumption, the equality <Math mode="inline" tex="\boldsymbol{\pi}(g){{\otimes}_{n\geq 1}{x_{n}}}={\otimes}_{n\geq 1}\pi_{n}(g){%&#10;x_{n}}" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m13.1">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
              </XMWrap>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> does not make any sense, since
<Math mode="inline" tex="(\pi_{n}(g){x_{n}})_{n\geq 1}" text="(pi _ n * g * x _ n) _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m14.2"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m14.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p1.m14.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m14.1">g</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, which is a <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{0}" text="C _ 0" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-sequence, may not be
equivalent
to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}" text="a" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, and thus may not belong to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p1.m17">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.</p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="A1.SS2.p2">
        <p>Infinite tensor products of unitary representations have already been
studied in various contexts (see for instance <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="BC" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite> and the
references therein). In
<cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="BC" separator="," yyseparator=","/>, Prop. 2.3]</cite>, the following observation is made: suppose that,
for each <Math mode="inline" tex="{n\geq 1}" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="U_{n}" text="U _ n" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is a unitary
operator on <Math mode="inline" tex="{H_{n}}" text="H _ n" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then there exists a unitary operator
<Math mode="inline" tex="\boldsymbol{U}={\otimes}_{\gnU}{}_{n}" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <ERROR class="undefined">\gnU</ERROR>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp role="FLOATSUBSCRIPT" scriptpos="2">
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> satisfying</p>
        <equation xml:id="A1.Ex132">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\boldsymbol{U}\bigl{(}{{\otimes}_{n\geq 1}{x_{n}}}\bigr{)}={\otimes}_{\gnU}{}_%&#10;{n}{x_{n}}" xml:id="A1.Ex132.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
                <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>

                </XMApp>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>for every decomposable vector <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}={{\otimes}_{n\geq 1}{x_{n}}}" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
              <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> with respect to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}" text="a" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> if and only if the series
<Math mode="inline" tex="\sum_{n\geq 1}\bigl{|}1-{{\langle{U_{n}{a_{n}}},{a_{n}}\rangle}}\bigr{|}" text="(sum _ (n &gt;= 1))@(absolute-value@(1 - list@(U _ n * a _ n, a _ n)))" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="sum" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">∑</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>

                </XMApp>

                      <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                          <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p2.m8.1.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p2.m8.1.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m8.1.1">

                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>

                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m8.1.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is convergent (which is
equivalent to requiring that the <Math mode="inline" tex="C_{0}" text="C _ 0" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">C</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>-sequence <Math mode="inline" tex="(U_{n}{a_{n}})_{n\geq 1}" text="(U _ n * a _ n) _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p2.m10.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m10.1">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">U</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be
equivalent to <Math mode="inline" tex="{({a_{n}})_{n\geq 1}}" text="a _ n _ (n &gt;= 1)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p2.m11.1"/>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m11.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, i. e. to the fact that <Math mode="inline" tex="{\otimes}_{\gnU}{}_{n}a_{n}" text="absent tensor-product _ [\gnU] _ n a _ n" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp meaning="tensor-product" role="MULOP">
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                  <XMTok meaning="tensor-product" name="otimes" role="MULOP">⊗</XMTok>
                  <ERROR class="undefined">\gnU</ERROR>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="pre2"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be a
decomposable vector with respect to <Math mode="inline" tex="{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}" text="a" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>). It follows from this
result that the formula (<ref labelref="LABEL:Eq1"/>) makes sense in <Math mode="inline" tex="{\bigotimes_{n\geq 1}^{\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{a}}{H_{n}}}" text="((tensor-product _ (n &gt;= 1)) ^ a)@(H _ n)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="160%" mathstyle="text" meaning="tensor-product" name="bigotimes" role="SUMOP" scriptpos="post">⊗</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="bold italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="0.8pt" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> if and
only if the series

                            </XMApp>

                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="A1.E23.m1.2.2">
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="120%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>is convergent for every <Math mode="inline" tex="g\in G" text="g element-of G" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="element-of" name="in" role="RELOP">∈</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">G</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Under this condition <Math mode="inline" tex="\boldsymbol{\pi}(g)={\otimes}_{n\geq 1}\pi_{n}(g)" xml:id="A1.SS2.p2.m16">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
              <XMWrap>
