                                      <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex144.m2.5.1">
                                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                          <XMApp>
                                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMDual>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="A1.Ex144.m2.1"/>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                              <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex144.m2.1">
                                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                              </XMApp>
                                              <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER" rpadding="1.7pt">4</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post8"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="A1.Ex144.m2.6"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual xml:id="A1.Ex144.m2.6">
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="A1.Ex144.m2.6.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex144.m2.6.1">
                                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok mathstyle="display" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                          <XMApp>
                                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMDual>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok meaning="norm"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="A1.Ex144.m2.2"/>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok role="OPEN">||</XMTok>
                                              <XMApp xml:id="A1.Ex144.m2.2">
                                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">y</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                              </XMApp>
                                              <XMTok role="CLOSE">||</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="210%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>for every <Math mode="inline" tex="n\geq 1" text="n &gt;= 1" xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geq" role="RELOP">≥</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Since
<Math mode="inline" tex="\underline{\lim}_{\,n\to+\infty}m(|{{\langle{\pi_{n}(\,\centerdot\,){a_{n}}},{%&#10;a_{n}}\rangle}}|^{2})=0" text="(underline@(limit)) _ (n to + infinity) * m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi _ n * centerdot * a _ n, a _ n))) ^ 2 = 0" xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="underline" role="UNDERACCENT">¯</XMTok>
                      <XMTok meaning="limit" role="LIMITOP" scriptpos="post">lim</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" lpadding="1.7pt" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="infinity" name="infty" role="ID">∞</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m6.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m6.2">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m6.2.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMDual xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m6.2.1">
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m6.2.1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m6.2.1.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m6.2.1.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m6.1"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok name="centerdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m6.1">∙</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post6"/>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m6.2.1.2">
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post5"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">a</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and the two other terms are equal to
zero for <Math mode="inline" tex="n" text="n" xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> sufficiently large, <Math mode="inline" tex="m(|{{\langle{\boldsymbol{\pi}(\,\centerdot\,){\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{x}}},{%&#10;\mskip 1.5mu \boldsymbol{y}}\rangle}}|^{2})=0" text="m * (absolute-value@(list@(pi * centerdot * x, y))) ^ 2 = 0" xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m8.3"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m8.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post2"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m8.3.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMDual xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m8.3.1">
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m8.3.1.1"/>
                                <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m8.2"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m8.3.1.1">
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="bold italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMRef idref="A1.SS2.p7.m8.1"/>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok role="OPEN" rpadding="1.7pt" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok name="centerdot" role="MULOP" rpadding="1.7pt" xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m8.1">∙</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" rpadding="0.8pt" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="0.8pt">,</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="bold italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m8.2">y</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.
Weak mixing of <Math mode="inline" tex="\boldsymbol{\pi}" text="pi" xml:id="A1.SS2.p7.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="bold italic" name="pi" role="UNKNOWN">π</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> now follows from standard density arguments.</p>
      </para>
    </subsection>
  </appendix>
